snyad cig 'bab cing// me tog 'bras ldan sman dang nags tshal skyod byed pa// ma dros gnas pa'i klu dbang klu bdag 'arten gnas te// den klu yi bdag po de yimathu dpal yin/ rgyal
ba'i nyan thos pa dag ji snyang chos ston dang// 'chad dang rigs pa dag dang ldan par brjod pa dang// mchog 'phags bde ba byed dang de yi 'bras thob pa// de dag kun kyang de bzhin gshegs
pa'i skyes bu'i mthu// ci'i phyir zhe na rgyal bas chos tshul gang bstan pa// de la mi mchog slob mar gyur pas mngon bslabs shing// mngon sum byas nas bslab pa ji bzhin ston byed de/
sangs rgyas mthus byed rang gi stobs kyi mthus ma yin// gang la shes rab pha rol phyin mchog mi dmigasangasheng// byang chub sems dpa' mi dmigs byang chub sems mi dmigs/ de
'a skang thos nas rmongs pa med cing mi skrag pa/ byang chub sems dpa' de ni bde gshegs shes rab spyod// gzugs med tshor ba med cing 'du shes sems pa med// de la rnam shes ]
gnas ni rdul cul yod pa min// de chos kun la ma gnas gnas pa med par sbyod// yongs su gzung da bde gshegs rnams kyi byang chub 'thob// ji ltar kun tu rgyu ba bzo sbyangs shes pa/
yis dmigs med phung po rnam par 'jig par 'byung ba ltar: byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig de ltar chos shes pa// mya ngan 'das la mi reg de ni shes rab gnas// yapa'ang
shes rab 'di ni gang yin su yi yin// gang las yin zhes chos 'dithams cad stong par rtog/ nye bar brtags nas zhum pa med cing skrag med pa// byang chub sems dpa' de ni byang chub
che ba yin// gal te mi shes bzhin du gzugs su 'du shes shing// tshor ba sems pa rnam shes phung por spyod byed na// phung 'di stong zhes rto ga na'ang byang+gachub sems dpa' ni//
mtshan ma la spyod skye med gnas la dadam yin// gang zhig gzugs min tshong min 'du shes sems pa min// rnam par shes lami spyod gnas pa med par spyod// de ni spyod ces bya
bar mi dmigs shes rab brtan// skyo med blo ldan ting 'dzin zhi ba mchog la reg/ byang chub sems gang de ltar 'dir bdag zhir gnas pa// de ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pas lung
bstan yin// bdag ni mnyam par gzhag nye'am langs shes rlom sems med// ci'i phyir zhe na chos kyi rang bzhin yongs shes phyir// de ltar spyod na bde/
gshegs rnams kyi shes rab sbyor// des na spyod med spyod pa yin par rab shes phyir// chos gang spyod pa de yang dmigs par mi 'gyur te// 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa yin/
gang zhig yod pa ma yin de ni med ces bya// byis pa rnams kyis de brtags yod dang med par byed/ yod dang med pa 'di gnyis med pa'i chos yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' gang gis
'di shes sa par 'byung// gang 'dir phung po lta dag sgyu ma 'dar shes shing// sgyu ma gzhan dang phung po gzhan du mi byed la/ sna tshogs 'du shes bral zhingan bar zhi spyod pa// 'di
shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa yin// dge ba'i bshes dang bran zhing lhag mthong ldan gyur pa// rgyal ba rnams kyi yus mthus skrag par yongs mi 'gyur// gang zhig sdig pa'i
grogs ldan gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog/ de ni snod so ma btang chu regazhig pa bzhin// ci phyir 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' bya zhe na// chags pa gcod byed kun la chags pa zad par 'dod//
rgyal ba rnams kyi byang chub chags med gyur la reg/ des na 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i ming thob bo// ci phyir 'di na sams dpa' no zhes bya zhen// sems can tshogs mang bo yi gamo/
na tu gyur pa dang// sems can khams kyi lha rnams chen po gcod pa ste// de phyir sems dpa' chen po zhesan rab brjod do// gtong ba che dang blo che ba dang mthu che dang/ rgyal ba rnams
kyi theg chen mareg la zhugs pa dang/ go chachen po bgos shing bdud kyi sgra 'dul ba/ de yi phyir na sems dpa' che zhes rab tu brjod// dper na sgyu ma mkhan gyis bzhi mdor sprul byas
te skye bo gal cher mgo mang bye ba gcod byed pa'i// gsad bya de dag ci 'dra de ltar byang chub sems// 'gro kun sprul 'drar rab shes de la 'grig pa med/ gzugs dang 'du shes tshor
ba dang ni sams pa dang// rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol yong pa min/ de ltar byang chub la 'jug zhus pa'i sems med pa// 'di ni gang zag dam pa rnams kyi go cha mchog/
ci phyir 'di ni byang chub theg chen bya zhe na// de gang bzhon nas sems can thams cad mya ngan blo// theg pa 'di ni mkha' 'dra gzhal med khang chen pa// dga' skyid bde ba mngon par thob byed theg
pa'i mchog/ gang zhig zhon na phyogs su 'gro ba dmigs su med// mya ngan 'das par 'gro bar gsungs pa 'gro mi dmigs// dparan mi shi de yi 'gro rgyu med pa bzhin// rgyu des na ni
mya na 'das shes rab tu brjod// byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi mtha' dang// da ltar byung ba mi dmigs dus gsum dag pa ste// gang dag de ni 'dus ma byas yinaspros med de//
wa bu/ @#// 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod ba yin// byang chub sems mkhas rig pa gang gi dus kyi tshe// skye med rnam par bsams te 'di ltar sbyod byed cing// snying
rje chen po skyed kyang sems can 'du shes med/ 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin mchog sbyod pa yin// gal te sems can 'du shes sdug bsngal 'du shes skyed/ 'gro ba rnams kyi don bya sdug/
bsngal spangosnyam ste// bdag dang sems can yongs rtog byang chub sems dang na so// 'di'i shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod ma yin// bdagaci 'dra ba de 'drar sems can thams
bcad shes// sems can thams cad ci 'dra de 'drar chos kun shes// skye ba med dang skye ba gnyis kar mi rtog pa// 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa yin// 'jig rten dag
na chos ming ji snyed yongs rjod pa// kun la skye ba dang ni yang dag 'das spangs nas/ ye shes 'chi med dam pa de las gzhal med 'thob// de phyir 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin ces bya//
byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig dogs med de ltar spyod// shes rab ldan de mnyam nyid gnas par shes pa bya// chos rnams rang bzhin med par yongs su shes gyur pa/ 'di ni shes rab
pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa yin// gang zhig gzugs la mi gnas tshor la mi gnas shing/ gang zhig 'du shes mi gnas sems par mi gnas la// rnam shes gang mi gnas pa chos nying gnas/
pa 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa yin/// rtag dang mi rtag bde dang sdug bsngal sdug mi sdug/ bdag dang bdag mdade bzhin nyid dang de bzhin stong/ 'bras bu thob
dang dgra bcom sa la mi gnas shing// rang rgyal sa dang de bzhin sangs rgyas sar mi gnas// ji ltar 'dren pa 'dusam byas khams la gnas shing// de bzhin 'dus byas la yang mi gnas/
gnas mad spyod// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' gnas la gnas med gnas// gnas mod gnas yin 'di ni rgyal bas gnas bar gsungs// gang dag bde gshegs nyan thos 'gyur bar bya
snyam dang// rang sangs rgyas dang de bzhin chos rgyal 'gyur 'dod pa/ babod pa 'di la ma brtan thob par mi nus te// dper na tshu rol pha rol 'gro dogs mi mthong bshad// chos 'chad pa
dang nyan dang bshad bya gang yin pa// 'bras bu thob dang rkyen rgyal de bzhin 'jig rten mgon/ mkhas pa gsal bas thob pa'i mya ngan 'das gang yin/ de kun sgyu ma lta bu r de bzhin gshegs
pas bstan// gang zag bzhi po 'di dag de la mi skrag ste// rgyal sras bden la mkhas dang phyir mi ldog pa dang// dgra bcom dri ma bsalacing som nyi sbas pa dang// bzhi pa dge ba'i
bshes kyis yongs su zin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' mkhas rig de ltar spyod pa'i// dgra bcom sa la mi rtog rkyen rtogs sa la min/ thams cad mkhyen nyid ched du sangs rgyas chos
rjes slob// gang zhig slob mi slob la mi slob de slob yin// gzugs 'phul yongs su nyams dang yongs su bzung phyir min// chos rnams sna tshogs yongs su
gzung phyir mi slob par// slob cing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yongs su 'dzin// nges 'byung gang yin 'di ni yon tan dga' ba'i slob// gzugs nareshes rab ma yin gzugs la shes
rab med// rnam shes snapungashes tshor dang sems pa 'di dag ni// shes rab ma yin 'di dag la yang shes rab med// 'di ni nam mkha'i khams dang mtshungs te tha dad med// dmig
nga rnams kyi rang bzhin de ni pha mthared// sems can rang bzhin gang yin de yang pha mtha' med// nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin de yang pha mtha' med/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa'i shes
rab de yang pha mtha' med// 'du shes tshu sel yin zhes 'dren pas yongs su bsgrags// 'du shes rnam par gshig nas spong ba pha rol 'gro// gang dag 'du shes bral ba 'di ni rjes thob pa//
da dag pha rol phyin nas ston pa'i bka' la gnas// gal te ston pas kyang n gang+ga'i bye snyed kyi// bskal par bzhugs tasems can zhes sgra yongs sgrags kyang// gzod nas dag pas
sams can skyo bar ga la 'gyur/ 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa yin// gang gis nga ni pha rol phyin pa'i mchog 'di dang// 'thun par smra gyur de tshe sngon gyi skyes mchog gis//
ba ma 'ongs pa yi dus na sangs rgyas 'gyur ro zhes// nga lung bstan par gyur skyes rgyal ba de skad gsungs// shes rab pha rol phyin pa gang la mgon spyod pa/ 'di ni gang zhig gus byas 'phrin/
dadachub byed pa// de la dug dang mtshon dang me dang chus mi tshugs// bdud dang bdud kyi phyogs kyis blugs kyang red mi 'gyur// la las bde gshegs yongs su mya ngan 'das pa yi//
mchod rten rin chen bdun las byas shing mchod byed la// bde bar gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag gang yi// kye ma snyad kyis byeb phrag stong zhing bkang ste// yongs su brtag gzung zhing
rnams phye ba mtha' yas na// sems can ji snyad 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyis/ las gzhan mi byed lha yi me tog spos rab dang// byug pas dus gsum bskal pa'am de bas lhag
mchod la// gang zhig gang las rnam 'dren stobs bcu 'byung 'gyur gyi// bde bar gshegs pa'i yum 'di glegs bam la bris te// 'tshang zhing me tog byug pas bsti stang byed 'gyur na//
mchod rten byas mchod bsod nams des ni chur mi phod// rgyal ba'i shes rab pha la phyin 'di rig sngags che// sems can khams mang su pan sdug bsngal chos zhi byed// gang dag 'das
dang gang dag phyogs bcu'i rajig rten mgon// rig sngags 'di bslabs sman pa'i rgyal po bla med gyur// gang dag phan dang snying rjer bcas par sbyad spyod pa// rig sngags 'di la bslabs
ba @#// nas mkhas pa byang chub ngeg 'dus byas bde gang 'dus ma byas bde gang yin pa// bde ba de kun 'di la byung bar rig par bya// sa bon btab nas sa la gnas
za 'byung 'gyur ba// tshogs pa red nas rnam mang gzugs dag rnam par bskyod// pha rol phyin lnga byung tshul yon tan ji snyed pa// de dag kun kyang shes rab pha rol phyin las skyes// 'khor
los sgyur rgyal las gang nasani rtag 'grob// las de 'di nas rin chen bdun dang dpung tshogs kun// gong nas rgyal ba'i shes rab pha rol phyin 'dra ragro// de nyid nas ni yon tan chos kun
'gro bar 'gyur// rgyal bas brgya byin dri ba yongs dris lan gsol pa/ gal te gang+ga'i bye snyed sangs rgyas zhing gyur la// de kun rgyal ba'i ring bsrel byur bur gtams gyur kyang//
bdag ni shes rab pha rol phyin pa 'di de len gyi slad ce na sku gdung mi gus bdag ma lags/ 'on kyang shes rab yongs su bsgoms pas mchod bgyid de// dper na rgyal po rten mi rim 'gro 'thob
pa ltar sangs rgyasaring bsrel shes rab pha rol phyin la brtan// nor bu rin chen yon tan kun ldan rin tang med// gab tsho gang du stsal ba de ni phyag bgyi ltos// de phyung gyur kyang
gab tshe la ni dga' bgyid de// yon tan de dag nor bu rin chen de yi lugs// de bzhin shes rab pha rol phyin mchog yon tan gyis// rgyal ba upan 'das kyang ring bsrel mchod pa b.ros//
tha00 de ltas gang zhig rgyal ba'i yon tan 'dzin 'tshal des// shes rab pha rol phyin drung 'di ni thar pa lags// sbyin pa sbyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba shes rab ste// tshul khrims bzod pa
brtson 'grus bsam gtan de bzhin no// dge ros chud mi gzan phyir yongs su 'dzin pa yin/ 'di ni chos rnams thams cad tshul gcig ston par byed// dpar na 'dzam bu gling
na shing rnams bye ba stong// rnam pa sna tshogs rnam pa du ma gzugs mang ba/ grib par gyur pa'i gras su brjod pa ma gtogs par// grab m sna tshogs mad cing bye brag yod ma yin//
de bzhin rgyal ba'i pha rol phyin lnga 'di dag kyang// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i me nyid thob par 'gyur// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid phyir yongs su bsdus byas na/ byang chub ces bya
drug po 'di kun ro gcig 'gyur/ byang chub sems dang 'gal te rab tu mi shes bzhin// gzugs dang 'du shes tshor dang sems pa rnam par shes// mi rtag yongs su ston pa
bcos la spyod pa ste/ mkhas pa nas yang chos rnams 'jig par mi byed do// gang la gzugs min tshong min 'du shes mi dmigs shing/ rnam par shes pa ma yin sems pa mi
ngamigs la// chos kun skye med stong pa'i tshul du rab shes pa// 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa yin// la las gang+ga'i klung gi bye snyeng zhing rnams na// sems can
snyad 'khod kun dgra bcom nyid btul bas// gang gis shes rab pha rol phyin 'di yig bris te// sems can mchogal glegs byin bsod nams khyad par 'phags//
zaci phyir zhe na snumchog de dag 'dir bslabs nas// chos rnams mtha' dag stong pa nyid du 'dir ston byed// de dganyan thos myur du rnam par grol la reg/ rang rgyal byang chub dang ni sangs rgyas
byang chub reg/ myu gu med par 'jig rten sdod byung yong mad na// de la yal 'dab me tog 'bras bu ga la 'byung/ byang chub sems med rgyal 'byung 'jig rtan yong med na// 'bras
bu brgya byin tshangs pa nyan thos ga la 'byung/ ma'i dkyil 'khor gang tshe 'od kyi dra ba 'gyed// de tshe sams can las byed brtson pa de bzhin du// mkhas pa'i shes phyir 'jig rten
byang chub sems byung na// ye shes kyis ni sams can yon tan chos dang ldan// dper nam dros gnas pa'i klu bdag med gyur na// 'dzam bu gling 'dir chu klung 'bab par ga la lcagyur//
chu klung mang name tog 'bras bu 'byung mi 'gyur// rgya mtsho la yang rin chen gzugs mang yod par 'gyur// de bzhin 'dir yang byang chub sems med bder gshegs kyi// ye shes 'jig
rten 'di dag kun kyang gal 'byung// yo shes med na yon tan 'phel med byang chub med/ rgya mtsho 'dra ba'i sangs rgyas chos kyang med par 'gyur// 'jig rtan 'di na snang byed srog
wa chags ji snyed pa// kun gyis snang bar bya phyir 'od rnams byung ba bas// ma'i dkyila'akhor 'od zer gcigaphyung chos mchog ste// snang byed tshogs kyi 'od rnams kun gyis char mi
pho8 nyan thos tshogs rnams ji snyad sbyin dang tshul khrims dang// bsgom dang rab tu ldan pa'i bsod nams tshogs bskyed pa'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su yi rang sems gcig lu
nyan thos tshogs kyi bsod nams phung pos char mi phod/ 'dus dus sngon gyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig gang/ dazhing mang mthar yas bye stong dag na gang bzhugs dang// gang yang mya ngan 'ang
pa 'jig rten mgon po rnams // sdug bsngal 'dra par bya phyir rin chen chos ston pa// dang po byang chub mchog tu sems skyed bskyed pa nas/ rnam par 'dren pa rnams kyi dam chos zad kyi
dus de bar rgyal ba de dag bsod nams gang yin pa// pha rol phyin dang ldan dang sangs rgyas chos gang dang// gang yang sangs rgyas sras rnams dang ni nyan thos dang// slob dang me
slob dge ba zag bcas zag med pa// bsdus dang byang chub sems dpa' rjes su yi rang zhing/ da 'gro ba'i don rgyu byang chub phyir na thams cad sto// yongs sngo gal de sems su 'du shes
'byung 'gyur zhing// byang chub 'du shes yongs sngo sems can 'du shes na// 'du shes phyir na lta gnas sems ni gsum la chags// dmigs ba yod pas yongs su bsngos par chu da
ma yin// gal te 'di ltar chos 'di 'gags shing zad pa dang/ gang du yongs su bsngo ba de yong zad pa dang// chos kyis chos la nam yang mi stoshes gyur na//
de ltar rab tu shes pas yos su bsngos pa yin// gal te mtshan mar khyed na de ni bsngo ma yin// ci ste mtshan ma med na byang chub bsngo ba yin// ji ltar dug dang 'dres pa'i kha zas bzang
za ba da kar po'i chos la dmigs pa'ang de 'drar rgyal bas gsungs// de ltas 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ba bslab bya ste// ji ltar rgyal ba de dag dge ba de mkhyen pa// rnam pa
gang yin 'byung gang yod+ma nyid gang yin la// rjes su yi rang de lta de ltar yongs su bsngo// de ltar bsod nams byang chub yongs su sngo byed na// dug mdasangs rgyas mi stongs rgyal bas gsu'us
pa zla/ de ltar yongs sngo dpar po 'jig rten dmigs can gyi byang chub sems dpa' jisAd thams cad zil gyis non// dmus long dmigs bu med pa byeb khrag khrig rnams //
lam yang mi shes grong khyer 'jug par ga la 'gyur// shes rab la nga na mig med pha rol phyin lnga cudi// dmigs bu med pas byang chub reg par nus ma yin// gang tshe shes rab kyis ni rab tu
zin gyur pa// de re mig red gyur cing 'di yi ming thob bo// dper na ri mo'i las ni yongs zin mig med pa// ji srid mig la bris par ngan pa ma thob bzhin// gang tshe 'dus byas 'dus
ni/ma byas dang dkar gnag chos// shes rab rnam par bshig nas rdul tsam mi dmigs tshe// 'jig rten dag shes rab pha rol phyin grangs 'gro// nam mkha' gang la'ang cung bar mi
gnas de dang 'dra// gal te bdag ni rgyal ba'i shes rab spyod bya zhing// sems can sdug bsngal reg par khrag khrig mang dgrol soms// sems can rtadu shes yongs rtogs byang chub
sems dpa' ste/ de ni shes rab pha rol phyinamchog spyod ma yin// byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig sngon chad spyod pa'i tshe// pha rol phyin 'dir spyod pa mkhas pa som nyamad//
thos ma thag tu de ni ston pa'i 'du she sa skyed// de nas byang chub zhi ba myur du rtogs par 'gyur// sngon spyadatsher sangs rgyas khrag khrig bkur byas kyang// rgyal ba'i shes ba pha rol phyin
la ma dad na/ thos nus blo chung de yis 'di ni sbyong byed de// spangs nas skyabs med gyur pa de ni mnar med 'gro// de lta bas na gal te sangs rgyas ye shes mchog/ nges par 'dod
na rgyal ba'i yum ra der dad par gyis// dper na tshong pa rin chen gling du song nas ni// khrong zad slar log lta bu r gyur na mi rung ngo// gzugs kyi dag pa 'bras bu dag par rig par bya//
'bras bu gzugs dag thams cad mkhyen nyid dag bar gsungs// thams cad mkhyen nyid 'bras bu dag dang gzugs dag pa// nam mkha'i khams dad mtshungs te dbyer med gcad du med//
bak+khawaM @#// dpa' bo gar spyod shes rab pha rol phyin pa yis// khams gsum yang dag 'das la rnam par grol ba'ang min// nyon mongs bsal bar gyur kyang skye ba ston par
byang rga dang na dang 'chi bamed kyang 'chi 'pho ston// 'gro ba 'di dag ming dang gzugs kyi 'dam la chags/ rlung gi 'khor lo lta bu'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lor 'khum//
'gro ba 'khrul pa ra dgas rgyur chud 'drar shes nas// shes rab ldan pa mkha' la bya bzhin rnam par rgyu// spyod pa yongs dag gang zhig gzugs lami spyod cing// rnam shes 'dushes
tshor ba sems par mi spyod na/ dpe ltar spyod pa chags pa thams cad yongs sbyangs shing// chags las rnam grol bde gshegs rnams kyi shes rab spyod// de ltar sbyod pa'i
byang chub sems dpar mkhasagasal ba// chags pa bcad nas 'gro la chags pa med par 'gro// nyim sgra gcan gzo'i bral lhang nger 'dug pa dang/ ma btang rtswa dang shing dang nags
tshal srog pa bzhin// chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin dag cing yo pas dog par// byang chub sems dpa' shes rab pha rol phyin lta na// byed pa po yang mi dmigs chos kun mi
dmigs te/ 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin mchog sbyor ba yin// rgyal ba la ni lha rgyal brgya byin gyis zhus pa// byang chub sems dpa shes rab spyod pa ji ltar brtson// thung
bkan/ po khams la rdul tsam brtson par mi byed cing// phung por mi brtson de ni byang chub sems dpa' brtson// gang zhig chos 'di sprul dang rgyu ma 'drar shes nas// som nyi med cing slob/
la phying zhing sbyor byed ba// sams can de ni ring nas theg chen zhugs rig bya// sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig mang la lhag byas yin// dgon pa'i lam ni dpag tshad mang bar zhugs pa'i
mis rtaganag rdzi mtshams kyi nags tshal phun sumatshogs mthong na// de dag grong dang grong khyer ba'i rtags snyam ste// dbugs phyin rnyed par gyur cing chom rkun 'jigs pa med//
de bzhin byang chub yongs su tshol tshe rgyal rnams kyi// shes rab pha rol phyin 'di man ba gang thob pa// de ni dbugs phyin thob par gyur cing 'jigs med de// dgra bats+tsom sa la ma yin
rkyen rdzogs sa la min// mi zhig rgya mtsho'i chu ni blta phyir 'gro ba yis// gal te shing dang nags tshal ri mthong da dung ring// ci ste rtags ma mthong na rgya mtsho chen po ni// che bar
gyur to snyam na de la som med// de ltar byang chub dam par rab zhugs rgyal ba yi// shes rab pha rol phyin pa 'di nyan rig par bya// rnam par 'dren pas maNon sum lung bstan ma
gyur kyang/ sangs rgyas byang chub ring por mi thogs bdag rig cagyur// dpyid dus bzang la sdong po lo ma lhags gyur na/ yal gas ring po mi thengs 'bras me tog kun// shes
rab pha rol phyin 'a di su yi lag thob la/ ring bor mi thogs 'dren pa rnams kyi byang chub 'thob// dper na bud med sbrum gang sdug bsngalanyen gyur na// de ni de yi
btsa' ba'i dus la khab shes bya/ de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' rgyal kha'i shes rab na// dga' dang 'dunabaskyud pa myur du byang chub rig/ shes rab pha rol ni mchog spyod tshe
rnal 'byor ba// gzugs kyi 'pha'ab ba dang ni yongs su 'grib mi mthong// gang zhig chos dang chos min chos dbyis mi mthong zhing// mya ngan 'das la mi reg da na shes rab gnas//
[%, ]gang 'ge 'dir sbyor sangs rgyas chos rnams mi rtog ste// stobs dang rdzu 'phrul rkang pa byang chub zhi mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog rtog bral byin gyi rlabs kyis spyod// 'di ni shes rab
wA pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa yin// smra ba'i zla bas ngas rgyas la narab 'byor zhus// yon tan dga' ba rnams kyi bar du gcod gang lags// ston pas bka' stsa la bar du gcod par
'gyur mang ste// de las re zhing cung zad tsam zhig yongs su brjod// rgyal ba'i shes rab pha rol phyin 'di yig 'bri tshe// spobs pa tha dad rnam ba du ma 'byung 'gyur zhing/ 'gro
ba'i don ma byas par glog bzhin myur du yang// yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba 'di ni bdud kyi las// 'di bshad tshon kha cig som nyi za tsagyur te// 'dren bas 'dir ni bdag gi ming yang
[4]/yongs ba brjod// rigs dang sa dang rus kyang yongs su ma brjod ces// de ninyan par mi bsgyur sbyong 'gyur bdud kyi las// de ltar mi shes de dag rtsa ba bor nas ni// rmongs pas
yal ga dag dang 'dab na tshol bar 'gyur// glang po red kyang glang po'i rjes ni tshol ba ltar// shes rab pha rol phyin pas mdo tshol de bzhin no// dbar na la la ro brgya ldan pa'i zas rnyed la/
bras mchog rnyed nas bris ngan tshol bar byed pa ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' phu pol phyin pa 'di rnyed nas// dgra bcom sa yis byang chub tshol byed de bzhin no// sti stang 'dod par 'gyur zhing
rUng pa 'dod 'gyur dang// lta dang bcas dba'i sems kyi khyim 'dris byed ldan zhing// chos btang nasan chos min bya ba spyod 'gyur ba// lam bor lam go 'gro ba 'di ni bdud kyi las//
gang dag de yi tshon 'dun cing dad gyur nas// chos kyi dam pa 'di'i zhan du song ba las// de dag gis ni chos smra bya ba ldan rig nas// dga' ba med cing yid mi bde ba gyur nas 'gro
de yi tshe na bdud kyi las 'di 'byung bar gyur// de tshe gang dag gis ni dge slong mang dkrugasanas// shes rab pha rol phyin 'di 'dzin par mi 'gyur ba'i// bar du gcod pa rnam mngagazhan
yang 'byung bar 'gyur// rin chen rin tang med pa rnyed gyur gang dag yin/ de dag dkon la dus rnams rtag tu 'tsho sa 'ang mang// de bzhin rgyal ba'i shes rab pha la phyin pa mchog/ rin
bya// chen chos kyang dkon la rtag tu 'tshe ba'ang mang// theg pa gsar du zhugs pa'i sems can blo chung ba// gang zhig dkon pa'i rin chen 'di'i ma rnyedan// de la bar
chang bya phyir 'dud ni spro bar 'gyur// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas de dag yongs su 'dzin la sbyor// gzhig na bar gyur la bun mang yod pa// de kun yid mi bde zhing de la rim gror byed//
de bzhin phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams kyi sangs rgyas kyang// yum gyur shes rab dam pa 'di la dgongs ba mdzad// gang dag 'das dang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten mgon gang dang/
'ongs dus na 'byung 'gyur de dag 'di las 'byung// 'jig rtan ston pa rgyal ba rnams kyi skyed byed yum// sems can gzhan dang sems kyi spyod pa ston par byed// 'jig rten de bzhin
nyid dang dgra bcom de bzhin nyid// rang rgyal de bzhin nyid dang rgyal sras de bzhin nyid// gcig pa nyid de dngos bral gzhan min de bzhin nyid// shes rab pha rol phyin pa de bzhin gshegyi
pas mkhyen// mkhas pa 'jig rten gnas sam mya ngan 'das kyang rung// chos kyi skyon med chos rnams stong pa 'di gnas te/ byang chub sems dpas de bzhin khyod 'di rjes su rtogs/
de phyir de bzhin gshegs shes sangs rgyas mtshan gsol to// shes rab pha rol phyin pa dga' tshal la brtan pa// stobs bcu rnam 'dren rnams kyi spyod yul 'di yin te// sems
can sdug bsngal ngan song gsum las yongs 'don kyang// de dag nams kyang sems can 'du shes 'gyur pa med// dper na seng ge ri sul bton nas 'jigs med par// ri dgas phra
mo mang skrag byed cing+ga sgra sgrog ltar// mi yi sang ge shes rab pha rol phyin brten nas// mu stegs can mang sgrag byed 'jig rten sgra yang sgrog/ dper na nam mkhar gnas pa nyi ma'i 'od
brar ni/ sa 'di skams par byed cing gzugs kyang rab tu ston/ de bzhin chos rgyal/shes rab pha rol phyin brten pa// srid pa'i chu klung skams shing chos kyang rab tu ston// gzug
rnams mi mthong tshor ba dag kyang mi mthong zhing// 'du shes mthong ba red 'ab sems pa mi mthong zhing// gang la rnam par shes dad sems yid mthong yod pa// 'di ni chos mthong yin zhes de
bzhin gshegs pas bstan// nam mkha' mthong zhes sems can tshig tu rab brjod pa// nam mkhar ji ltar mthong ste don 'di brtag par kyis// de ltar chos mthong ba yang de bzhin
gshegs pas bstan// mthong ba dpe gzhan gyis ni bsnyad par nus pa yin// gang gis de ltar mthong ba de yis chos kun mthong// rgyal po btang snyoms 'dug cing blon po kun byed
ltar sangs rgyas mdzad dang nyan thos chos rnams ji snyed pa// de dag thamasacad ngashes rab pha rol phyin pa byed// rgyal po grong du mi 'gro khul 'bor mi 'gro bar// rang gi yul
'a du ba thams cad sdud pa ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' chos nyid gang du'ang mi 'gro la// sangs rgyas sa yi yon tan gang yin thams cad sdud// gang
la bde gshegs byang chub sems dpa' dad bstan yod// shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchogal bsam sbyor ba/ nyan thos rang rgyal sa gnyis shin tu 'das byas nas/ bril gyis mi
non rgyal ba'i byung chub myur du 'thob// dper na rgya mtshor 'jug pa'i gru na chag 'gyur la// mi gang ro 'am rtswa'am shing na mi 'dzin pa/ chu dbus 'jig par 'gyur te ngogs su phyin
mi 'gyur/ gang zhig 'dzin pa rgya mtsho'i pha rol phyin bar 'gyur// de ltar dad ldan dang ba thob ba gang zhig ni// shes rab pha rol phyin yum rjes su mi 'jug min// de dag skabs kyi
yon tan shes rab yongs zin na// mchog tu rmad byung bde gshegs byang chub gyur du reg/ dper na la la rdza so ma gtang chu skyudan/ nyam chud phyi na myur du 'jig par rig par bya//
sa btang bum par chu bskyod lam du 'jig pa yi// 'jigs pa med cing bde ba'i khyim du phyin par 'gyur// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' dad pa mang gyur kyang// shes rab rnam par
nyams na myur du ma rus 'gyur// dad pas shes rab de ni yongs su zin gyur na// sa gnyis shin tu 'das te byang chub mchog thob 'gyur// dper na bcos legs ma byas gru ni rgya mtsho'i/
wa nang/ nor dang bcasazhing tshong par bcas te 'jig par 'gyur/ gru de legs par bcos legs byas dang ldan gyur na/ mi 'jig nor dang bcas par gas su phyin par 'gyur//
da ltar byang chub sems dpa' dad pas yongs bsgoms kyang// shes rab med na byang chub las ni myur nyams 'gyur// de nyid shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog ldan n// ma smras ma
nyams rgyal ba'i bya chub reg par 'gyur/ lo brgya 'dishu lon te rgas shing sdug bsngal ma la sa kyang bdag nyid 'gro bar nus pa ma yin te// de ni g.yas g.yon gnyis nas mi yis brten
byas nas// 'gyel ba'i 'jigs pa med snying bde blag 'gro bar 'gyur// de bzhin byang chub sems da pa' shes rab stobs chung bas// rab tu zhugs par gyur kyang rab tu nyams par 'gyur/
de nyid thabs dang shes rab mchog gis yongs zin na// mi nyams de bzhin gshegs kyi byang chub reg par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' dang po'i las kyi sar gnas gang//
lhag ba'i bsam pas sangs rgyas byang chub mchog zhugs pa// slob ma bzang po bla ma gus ldan de dag gis// bla ma mkhas pa rnams la rtag tu bsten par bya// ci phyir zhe na
mkhas pa'i yon tan de las 'byung// de dag shes rab pha rol phyin pa rjes su ston// sangs rgyas chos rnams dge ba'i bshes la bstan to zhes// yon tan kun gyi mchog mapa'
rgyal bde skad gsungs// sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod dang de bzhin brtson 'grus dang/ bsam gtanashes rab byang chub yongs su bsngo bar gyis/ byang
chub thung bor zhenanas mchog 'dzin ga byed kyis// dang po'ilas can de la de skad bstan par bya/ de ltar spyod pa legs gtso smra ba'i zla ba rnams // 'gro ba'i skyabs dang dpung gnyen dang
ni gnas yin te// rten dang blo dang gling dang yongs 'dren don 'dod pa// gsal byed sgron mchos mchog skya ba mi 'khrugs yin// grags chen ldan rnams bya dka' go cha gyon byed de//
phung bo khams dang skye mched rnams kyi go cha min// theg gsum 'du shes bral zhing yongs su bzung ba yin// mi ldog g.yo ba med cing mi 'khrugs chos can yin// de dag de 'dra'i chos
dang ldan zhing sbyos ba med// the tsom som yid gnyis bral zhing don dang ldan// shes rab pha rol phyin pa thos nas mi nur ba// gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog cing mi ldog rig par bya//
'dren pa rnams kyi chos 'di zab sta mthong bar dka'// sus kyang rtogs pa med cing thos par gyur med pa// de phyir phan mdzang brtser ldan byang chub b.res nas 'di// sems can
tshogs sus shes snyam thugs khral chung bar mdzad// sems can rnams ni gnas la dga' zhing yul rnams 'dod// 'dzin la gnas shing mi mkhas blun rmongs mun pa bzhin// thob
thabs dpar bya ba'i tshes ni gnas med 'dzin med de// des na 'jig rten dag dang rtsod pa 'byung ba yin// namamakha'i khams ni shar gyi phyogs dang lho phyogs dang// de bzhin nub kyi phyogs
dad byed phyogs pha mtha' yas// stong dang 'og dang phyogs bcu'i ji snying rnams na'ang yod// tha dad gyur pa med cing bye brag gyur pa med// 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid gang na phyin de
bzhin nyid// da ltar de bzhin nyid gang dgra bcom de bzhin nyid// chos kun de bzhin nyid gang dgra bcom de bzhin nyid// chos kyi de bzhin nyid 'di thams cad bye brag med/ de
ga shegs byang chub zo dad chos dang bral gyur ba// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig thob 'dod pa/ thabs dang ldan bsangashes rab pha rol phyin la sbyor/ 'dren pa'i shes rab
mdan thob par 'gyur ma yin// bya zhig lus che dpag tshad brgya rtsalnga bcu par// gyur la 'dab gshog zad de nyams rtsal yod min na// de yis sum cu rtsa gsum gnas nas 'dzam
gling 'dir// bdag nyid mtshongs na de ni nyamanyis 'gyur ba yin// rgyal b rnams kyi pha rol phyin pa lnga 'di yang// bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig mang bor bsgrubs byas shing//
smon la mtha' yas rgya chen 'jig rten rtag brten kyang// thabs med shes rab bral ba nyan thos nyid du ltung// sangs rgyas theg pa 'di la nges par 'byung 'dod gang// 'gro ba kun
0 )@#// lang sems snyoms phama'i 'du shes dang// phan ba'i sems dang byams pa'i yid kyis brtul bya zhing// tha ba med cing drang la tshig 'jam smra bar bya// 'jig
za rten mgon la gnas brtan rab 'byor yongs zhus ba// yon tan rgya mtsho tonamo ngas ma mchis rtags bstan gsol// mthu che ba dag ji ltar slar ldog mi 'gyur ba// de ltar yon tan
phyogs tsam rgyal bas lung bstan gsol// tha dang 'du shes bral zhing rigs pa ldan tshig smra/ dge sbyong dag dang bram ze gzhan la rten mi byed: mkhas pa dus rnams rtag par
ngan song gsum po spangs// de dag dge bcu'i las kyi lam la mngon par brtson// zang zing med par ra gro lachos ni rjes su ston// chos la gcig tu dga' zhing rtag tu tshig
'jam ldan/ 'gro 'chag nyal dang 'dug pa shes bzhin rab tu ldan// gnya' shing bo nga tsam lta zhing 'gro la sems 'khrul med// gtsang byas gtsang ma'i gos 'chang gsum po
dben zhing dag/ rnyed 'dod ma yin khyamchog rtag tu chos 'dod pa// bdud kyi yul las 'das shing gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog bsam gtan bzhi la bsam gtan bsam gtan
der mi gnas// grags pa 'dod pa ma yini khro bas sems dkris med// khyim par gyur na rtag tu dngos po kun ma chags/ 'tsho ba'i phyir ni ya ngas longs spyod tshol mi byed//
man/ drag shul spyod sngags mi byed bud med sbyor sngags min// 'dod pa'i las can pho mor 'gyur zhes ston mi byed// rab tu dben pa'i shes rab pha rol phyin mchog brtson// 'thag
dang brtsod dang bral zhing byams pa'i sems kyang brtan// kun mkhyen 'dod cing bstan la rtogatu gzhol soms ldan// mtha' 'khob kla klo'i skya bo'i yul mthar rnam par spangs//
rang gi sa la dogs med rtag tu ri rab 'dra// chos phyir srog kyang 'dor zhing rnal 'byor rab tu brtson// mi ldeb rtags ni 'di dag yin par shes par bya// gzugs dang tshor dpa'adu
shes sems pa rnam shes rnams // thab ste rang bzhin mtshan ma med nyid rab zhi ba// dper na mda' las rgya mtsho'i gting thug tsho'al ba ltar// shes rab kyis ni brtags na phung po'i
gting gi red// byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig de ltar thob gyur rung// theg pa don dang chags med gang la phung po dang/ khams dang skye mched yod min chos 'di rtogs pa de'i//
bsod nams yang dag 'grub pa de las ci zhig yod// dper na 'dod chags chos la spyod pa'i skyes bu zhig/ bud med dus btab de dang ma phrad de yi ni// nyin gcig sems kyi rnam
rtog sbyod pa ji snyed pa// de snyadabaskal par byang chub sems dpas thob par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig bskal mang bye stong du// dgra bcom rang rgyal sbyin byed tshul khrims
srung byed dang// gang zhig shes rab pha rol phyin mchog ldan pa'i chos/ brjod pa'i legs pa bzhi dang tshul khrims char mi phod/ byang chub sems
dung gang zhig shes rab mchog bsgoms te/ de las langs nas gos pa med pa'i chos brjod cing// de yang 'gro ba'i don du byang chub rgyur sngon// dge ba de dang mnyam pa 'jig/
don gsum na med// bsod nams de dang gsog dang de bzhin stong pa dang// gsob dang yam brlu dang snying po med shes pa// de ltar bde gshegs rnams kyi shes rab spyad spyod na//
spyod tshe bsod nams dpag tu mang pa yongs su 'dzin// sangs rgyas kyis bshad rab tu spyod cing rab bstan pa'i// chos 'di thams cad brjod pa tsam du zang shesan// bskal pa
bye ba khrag khrig mang por brjod byas kyang/ chos kyi dbyings la zad pa med cing 'phel bamod// rgyal bu rnams kyi pha rol phyin ces bya ba gang// chos de rnams kyang ming tsam dun yongs
su bsgrags// yongs po rlom sems med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni// nyams pa med cing sangs rgyas byang chub mchog reg 'gyur/ 'bru mar snying po 'bar ba phrad pa dang po
[']yis// snying po tshig min de mad par yang de mi tshi// me lce phrad pa tha mas snying po tshig min la// me lce tha ma med par snying po tshig min ltar// dang po'i sems kyis byang chub
tha75 mchog rig ma yin la/ de med par yang de la reg par nus ma yin// tha ma'i sems kyis byang chub zhi ba thob min la// de med par yang de 'thob nus pa ma yin no// sa bon/
las ni myu gu me tog 'bras bu 'byung// de yang 'gugs shing yung mang ba de min ltar// de bzhin dang po'i sems kyang byang chub rgyu yin te// de yang 'gags la byang chub mad pa de
ma yin// chu yi thigs pas bum pa dang po tha ma'i bar// rim gyis nyung ngunyung ngus de yongs 'gangs pa ltar// de bzhin dang po'i sems kyang byang chub mchog rgyu ste/ rim gyis
dkar po'i yon tan rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'gyur// stong pa mtshan mang smon pa med par chos spyod cing/ mya ngan 'dus la mi reg mtshan mar mi spyod pa// dper na mnyan pa mkhas
ba phar 'gro tshur 'gro yang// mtha' gnyis mi gnas rgya mtshor gnas pa med pa bzhin// doltar sbyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di mnyam 'dag/ stobs bcus lung bstan byang
chub reg 'gyur rlom sems med// 'dilaci yang med ces byang chub skrag pa med// de ltar spyod pa 'di gshegs shes rab spyod pa yin// 'jig rten dgon pa'i lam dang mu gu nadabs
par [u0f10]mthong nas skrag pa med cing de nas go gyon te// phyi ma'i mu mthar rtag tu brtson zharag shos nas// yongs su skyo ba'i yid ni rdul tsam skyod ma byed/ byang chub sems dpa'/
rgyal ba'i shes rab spyod byed cing// phung po 'di dag gdod nas stong zhing skye mod shes/ mnyam par ma bzhag sems can khams la sIng rje'ajug/ bar skabs
der yang sangs rgyas chos las yongasami nyams// dbaran skyes bu mkhas pa yon tan dang ldan zhing// stobs ldan mi thub brtson byas sgyu rtsal tsho ga shes/ 'phong dang bzo gnas mang
ts+tsha po'i pha rol phyin gyur cing// sgyu ma sgrubashes 'gro don rab tu 'dod pa zhig/ pha dang ma dang chung mar bcas pa yongs bsdus nas// dgra byed mang ba dgon pa'i lam du phyin pa dang//
de yis dpa' zhing rtul phod skyes bu yong sprul te// bde bar song zhing phyir yang khyim du 'ong ba ltar// de bzhin de tsho byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa yang// sems can khams rnams kun
tu snying rje che skyed cing/ bdud bzhi dag dang sa gnyis las kyang rab 'das nas// ting 'dzin mchog la gnas shing byang chub reg mi byed// mkha' la rlung brten de la chu yi phung po brten//
de la sa chen 'di brten de la 'gro ba bton// sems can las la spyod pa'i rgyu ni de 'dra ste/ namamakha' gang la gnas yin ngon 'di bsam par gyis// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa'
stong pa nyid gnas pa// 'gro la sems can shes pa'i smon lam rton rgyun gyi bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs du ma ston byed cing// mya ngan 'das la mi reg stong par gnas med pa// dag
gi tshe na byang chub sems dpa' mkhas gsal ba// stong pa zhi ba'i ting 'dzin dam pa 'di spyod pa// bar skabs der ni mtshan ma rab tu sgom mi byed/ mtshan ma med par gnas shing
zhi la rab zhi sbyong/ bar sna'abur ba'i bya la gnas yod ma yin te// de la gnas pa ma yin sa la ltung mi 'gyur// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnam thar sgor spyod pa// ma
ngan 'das la ma rig mtshan mar spyod ma yin// dper na 'phong bslabs skyes bus gnam du mnga' 'phangs te// mda' gzhan dag ni phyi bzhin brgyud mar long btags nas// sdu
ma'i mnga' de sa la ltung ba'i skabs mi byed// mi de 'dod nam da' de sa la ltung bar 'gyur// de ltar shes rab pha rol phyin pamchog spyod pa// shes rab thabs stobs rdzu 'phrul
gyis ni rnamA spyod pa// de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba ji srid ma rdzogs par/ de srid stong nyid dam pa de ni thob ma byed// dper na dge slong rdzu 'phrul stobs mchog ldan pa zhig/ nam mkhar
gnas pa cig car cho 'phrul rnam par 'phrul// 'gro dang nAmag pa dang nyal dang 'dug pa ston// de na skyo ba med cing de la dub pa med// de bzhin byang chub sams dpa' mkhas pa stong
gnas shing/ ye shes rdzu 'phrul pha rol phyin la gnas pa med// 'gro ba dag la bya ba rnam pa mtha' yas ston// bskal pa bye bar skyo ba med cing dub pa med/ dper na me bka'
g.yang sa chen por 'dug byed cing// lag pa gnyis kas gdugs gnyis 'dzin cing nam mkha' la// mchong bar byed cing g.yas chen por lus bor nas/ ltung
bar mi 'gyur ji srid der ni 'gro bar 'gyur// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa snying rjer gnas// thabs dang shes rab gnyis kyi gdugs ni yongs bzung ste// chos rnams stong
pa mtshan med smon ba med rtog cing// mya ngan 'das la reg pa med la chos kyang mthong/ dper na rin chen 'dod pa rin chen gling song ste// rin chen rnyed nas phyir yang khyim du 'ongs gyur pa
der ni ded dpon 'ba' zhig bde bar 'tsho byed cing// gnyen bshes tshogs yid mi bder 'jog pa min pa ltar// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' stong nyid rin chen gyi// gleng du song ste
bsam gtan dbang po stobs thob pa/ mya ngan 'das la reg pa 'ba' zhig mngon dga' zhing// sems can sdug bsngal yid du 'jog par 'gyur ma yin// dper na don gnyer tshong pa rgyus/
shes bya ba'i phyir bar gyi grong khyer grong rdal gang yin bde bar 'gro// der yang mi gnas rin chen gling du'ang mi gnas la// rig pa khyim du mi gnas lam la mkhas par 'gyur// de
bzhin byang chub sems dpa' gsal de nyan thos dang// rang rgyal rnams kyi shes pa rnam grol kun la mkhas// de la mi gnas sangs rgyas ye shes gnas ma yin// 'dus ma byas la mi
wa/gnas lam gyi tshul shes yin// gang tshe 'gro la byams pa rjes su 'brel byas nas// ting 'dzin stong pa mtshan yang smon pa mer spyod pa// de ni mya ngan 'das pa 'thob par 'gyur zhe 'am//
'dus byas yin par gdags nus de ni gnas med do// dper na sprul pa'i mi lus mi snang ba yin zhing// den ming gis kyang ni gdags par nus pa ltar/ de bzhin byang chub sems dpa'
rnam thar sgor sbyong ba// don ming gis kyang ni gdags par nus pa yin// gal te spyod pa dang ni dbang po yongs 'dres la// byang chub sems dpa' stong pa mtshan ma med pa'i chos//
yongs su mi ston phyir mi ldog pa'i sa yi chos mi 'chang de ni lung ma bstan pa yin rig bya// dgra bcom sa dang rkyen gyi sangs rgyas ye shes dang// khams gsum ngag la rmi lam na yang/
mi 'dod zhing// sangs rgyas rnam mthong 'gyod chos kyang ston byed pa// de ni gi ldog lung bstan yin par rig par bya// rmi laman ni sems can ngan song gsum gnas mthong//
skad cig de la ngan song rgyun gnad smon lam 'debs// bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis ma ya phung po ni// de ni mi ldog lung bstan yin par rig bar bya// mi yi 'jig rten 'byung
po'i gdon dang nad mang ba// phan dang snying brtser ldan pa'i bden pa'i byin gyis zhi// 'on kyang rlom sems med cing nga rgyal skye med pa// de ni mi ldog lung bstan yin par rig par bya//
i ste de ni bden pa'i byin rlabs sna tshogs dag/ 'byor pas bdag lung bstan snyamatshos sems 'byung ba 'am// gal te byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyis lung
zabastan rlom// rlom sems gnas pa de ni blo chung shes bar bya// ming gi gzhi las 'dud na bar 'ongs gyur na// 'di skad smras te 'di ni khyod dang tha ma dang// khyod kyi bdun mas
tsho brgyud kyi bar gyi ming yin zhing// gang mo khyod ni sas rgyas 'gyur ba'i ming 'di yin// sbyangs sdom rnal 'byor ldan pa ci 'dra 'byung 'gyur la// khyod sngon yon tan tshul yang 'di 'dra zhes
brjod de/ de skad gang thos rlom sems byang chub sems dpa' ni// bdud kyis yongs su brlang zhing blo chung rig par bya/ rab tu dben pa'i grong dang grong khyer ri sul dang/ dgon
pa ben panags khrod rab tu rten byed cing// bdag stod gzhan la smod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni// bdud kyis yongs su brlang zhing blo chung rig par bya// rtag tu grong dang yul 'khor
grong rdal gnas byed cing// sems can smin byed byang chub brtson pa ma gtogs par// de ni dgra bcom rang rgyal 'dod pa gzhar mi skyod// 'di ni bse bar gshegs pa'i sras kyi dbon par
gsungs// gang zhig dpag tshad lnga brgya yod pa'i ri yi sul// sbrul gyis gang bar lo mang bye bar gnas byed kyang// dben pa 'di mi shes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de// lhag
pa'i nga rgyal rAng nas 'dre bar gnas pa yin// byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba'i don ba rtson bsam gtan dang// stobs dang dbang po rnams sbyar ting 'dzin thob de la// 'di ni dgon
dben sbyod pa min sAm b.ras byed pa// de ni bdud kyi spyod yul gnas shes rgyal bas gsungs// gang zhig grong ngam 'on te dgon par gnas kyang rung// theg pa gnyis kyi sems bral
byang chub mchog nges na// 'di ni 'gro don zhugs pa rnams kyi dben pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' drod nyam de ni bdag nyid 9 mas// de lta bas na byang chub dam pa tshol ba yi//
bsam pa drug ldan mkhas pas ngargyal nges bcom te// nad pa'i tshogs kyis gso zhu'i sman pa bsten pa ltar// g.yel ba med par dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten par bya/ sangs
rgyus byang chub mchog zhugs byang chub sems dpa' dag/ pha rol phyin dang bcas dge ba'i bshes su bstan// de dag rjes su ston byed 'di'i bsgrub pa yis// rgyu rnams gnyis
kyis sangs rgyas byang chub myur du rtogs// rgyal ba 'das dang ma byon phyogs bcu gang zhugs pa// kun las pha rol phyin pa 'di yin zhun ma yin// pha rol phyin 'di byang chub
mchog la zhugs rnams kyi/ gsal dang sgron dang snang dang ston mchog yin zhes bshad// ji ltar shes rab pha rol phyin pa mtshan nyid stong// chos 'di thams cad mtshan nyid de dang
ma/ @#// 'drar gnas shing// chos rnams stong zhing mtshan ma med par rag shes na// de ltar spyod pa bde gshegs shes rab spyod pa yin// sems can yongs
su stegs pas zas la 'dod byed cing/ 'khor bar chags pa'i yid dang ldan rnams rtag tu 'khor// bdag dang bdag gi chos gnyis yang dag min stong ste// byis pa
bdag nyid kyis 'di mkha' la mdud pa bor// dper na dogs pa'i 'du shes kyis ni dug langs pa/ dug de 'ong du song ba med kyang brgyal bar 'gyur// de bzhin byas pa/
bdag dang bdag gir khas len pa// bdag der 'du shes yang dag min rtog skye zhing 'chi// ji ltar 'dzin pa de ltar kun nas nyon mongs bstan// bdag dang bdag gar mi
dmigs rnam par byang bar gsungs// 'di la gang yang nyon mos rnam dag la med par// byang chub sems dpas shes rab pha rol phyin pa rtogs// 'dzam bu gling na
sems can ji snye ma lus pa// de dag thams cad byang chub mchog tu sems bskyen// lo stong bya ba mang por sbyin pa byin byas la// kun kyang 'gro ba'i don phyir byang chub rgyur
sngo yang// gang zhigashes rab sa rol phyin la mngon brtson pa// tha na nyim gcig cig rjes su 'thun byed na// de la sbyin pa'i phung po'i bsod nams char mi phod/ de phyir
mtsha/ g.yel med rtag tu shes rab 'jug par bya// shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ sIng rje chen po skyod cing sems can 'du shes med// de tshe mkhas pa 'gro ba kun
gyi sbyin gnas 'gyur/ rtag tu yul 'khor bsod snyoms don yod yongs su spyod// byang chub sems dpa' gang 'dir yun ring 'brel ba yi/ lha ma ngan song gsum gyi sams can
'grol ba'i phyir lam yangs pha rol sems can khams la ston 'dod pa// nyin mtshan shes rab pha rol phyin la brtson par bya// mi zhig sngon chad ma rung pa yi rin chen mchog
dus gzhan zhig na red par gyur te dga' ba las// red ma thag tu bag med gyur te stor na ni// stor bas rin chen mngon 'dod rtag tu sdug sngal lo// de ltar byang chub mchog zhugs rin chen
lta bu yis// shes rab pha rol phyin la rnal 'byor dor mi bya// rin chen rnyed nas blangs te rab tu brtson dkris nas// myur du 'gro bar byed pa zhi bar 'gyur ba bzhin/ nyi ma sprin
dang bral ba'i 'od zer dra ba can// mun nag thibs po'i mun pa thams cad 'joms 'char ba// srin bu me khyer srog gsa'abyung po thams cad dang/ skar ma'i tshogs dang zla ba'i
'od kun zil gyis gnon// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' shes rab pha rol phyin// mchog myong stong pa dang ni mtshan ma med spyod ba// mkhas pas lta ba'i thibs po bcom nas 'gro
ma/ @#// kun dang// dgra bcom rang rgyal byang chub sems mang hril gyis gnon// dper na rgyal po'i bu zhig nor stong don 'dod pa// kun gyi gtso bor 'gyur
te mngon par 'gro bya 'os/ 'di ni de lta na yang sems can mang dga' byed// thabs thob gyur te rgyal srid gnasanas smos kyi dgos// de ltar shes rab spyod mkhas byang chub sems
dpa' yang// bdud rtsi sbyin par byed cing lha dang mi rnams dga'/ 'di ni da ltan yang sems can nad phan brtson// chos kyi rgyal por gnas par gyur nas smos ci dgos//
dayi tshe na bdud na zug rngu ldan par 'gyur// mya ngas nyam thag sdug bsngal yid mi bde nyam chung/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' 'di yid nur 'gyur zhes/ 'jigs pa bstan phyir
phyogs rnams sreg cing skar mda' gtong// gang tshe mkhas pa de dag bsam pa rab ldan zhing// nyin mtshan shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog don lta// de tshe lus sems dag ni mkha' 'gro
bya ltar 'gyur// nag po'i rtsa lag rnams kyis glags red ga la 'gyur// gang tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'thab dang rtsod gyur cing// phan tshun ma mthun khros pa'i sems dang ldan
gyur pa// de tshe bdud ni dga' zhing mchog tunyams bder 'gyur// de gnyis rgyal ba'i ye shes las ni ring 'gyur snyam// de gnyis ring du 'gyur zhing sha za 'dra bar 'gyur// gnyis
mtha ka rang gis dam bcas nyams par byed par 'gyur// sdang zhing bzod dang bral la byang chub ga la yod// de tshe bdud rnams phyogs dang bcas te dga' bar gyur// lung bstan ma
thob byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig gis// lung bstan thob la sems khros rtsod pa rtsom byedan// gla ba skyon ldan sems kyi skud nug ji sAd pa// de su bskal par gzhi nas go cha
pago dgos so// sangs rgyas bzod pa'i pha rol phyin pas byang chub reg/ sems 'di bzung ba min snyam dran pa skyod byed cing// so sor 'chags par byed cing phyis kyang sdom byed la//
dga' bar mi byed de ni sangs rgyas chos 'dir slob// gang zhig slob tshe bslab pa gang yang khas mi len// slob pa po dang bslab pa'i chos rnams mi rnamigs shing// bslab dang bslab pa
ma yin 'di gnyis mi rtog pa// de ltar gang slob de ni sangs rgyas chos 'dir sleb/ byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig de lta'i bslab 'di shes// der ni gzhar yang bslabarkums tshul khrims
'chal mi 'gyur// de ni sangs rgyasachos b.res bya phyir 'di la slob// de ni bslab lamakhas te de ni dmigs pa med/ mkhas pa 'od byed rnams kyis shes rab rdo ltar slob/ dge ba ma
yin sems gcig tsam yang skyed mi byed zhimamakha' la 'gro ba'i zer gyis zil gnon pagi/ mdun gyi bar snang la ni mun pa mi gnas shing// shes rab pha rol phyin la bslab par byas
wa thu@#// rnams kyi// pha rol phyin pa thams cad 'dir ni 'dus par 'gyur// 'jig tshogs lta bar lta ba drug cu gnyis 'dus ltar// de bzhin pha rol phyin par
'di dag 'dus par gsungs// dperan srog gi dbang po 'gags na dbang po gzhan// gang dag ji snyed yod pa thams cad 'gag pa 'gyur// de ltar shes rab spyod pa mkhas pa
mchog rnams kyi// pha rol phyin pa thams cad 'di ni 'dus par gsungs/ byang chub sems dpas nyan thos yon tan gang dag dang// de bzhin rang rgyal yon tan kun la slob
byed cing// de dag de la mi gnas 'dod pa ma skyed de// 'a din bdag gi bslab bya yin snyam de phyir slob/ mi ldeg byang chub mchog la rab tu zhugs ba yi// sems bskyed pa
la bsam pa thag pas yi rang ba// stong gsum ri rab srang la gal bas tshad gzung rung// rjes su yi rang dag ba de ni de ltar min// dge ba don gnyer phan 'dod sems can ji snyed pa//
kun gyi bsod nams phung po la'ang yi rang 'gyur// de phyir de dag rgyal ba'i yon tan thob gyur nas// sdug bsngal zad par bya phyir 'jig rten chos sbyin byed// byang chub sems dpa'
gang zhig mi rtog chos rnams kun// stong dang mtshan ma med dang spros med yongs shes pa// de ni shes rab gnyis kyis byang chub tshol mi byed// rnal 'byor pa de shes rab pha rol phyin
mar ba/ mchog brtson/ nam mkha' 'gas de dang ni nam mkha' der 'gal ba// yod pa ga yin gang gis kyang ni de ma thob// de bzhin shes rab spyod mkhas byang chub sems dpa' yang//
nam glakha' lta bu yin te nye bar zhi bar spyod/ skye bo'i dbus na sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di snyam du// skye bo 'di mgu bya snyam mi sams de yang byed// rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs rab tu ston par
byed mthong yang// de la lus mang sems med ming yang yod ma yin// de bzhin shes rab spyod mkhas nam yang 'di snyam du/ byang chub rtogs nas 'gro ba yongs su dgrolami sems//
skye ba sna tshogs dang ni bya ba mang ldan pa/ sgyum lta bu r ston kyang rnam par mi rtog spyod// dper na sangs rgyas sprul pa sangs rgyas mdzad pa byed/ byed pa de la dregs pa cung zad skye mi/
'gyur// de bzhi'i shes rab spyadan/(khas byang chub sems dpa' yang// sprul pa rgyu ma bzhin du bya ba thams cad ston// shing mkhan bzo bo mkhas pas skyes pa bud med dang//
'dra ba'i bro byas de yang bya ba thams cad byed// de bzhin shes rab sbyor mkhas byang chub saMms dpa' yang// rnam par mi rtog ye shes bya thams cad byed// de ltar spyod ma bas/
rnams la lha tshogs mang po dag/ thal mo sbyar ba btud nas phyag kyang 'tshal bar byed/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams kyi sangs rgyas ji snyad pa dang/ yon tan bsngags pa'i/
'phrong ba yongs su brjod pa mdzad// gang+gA'i klung mnyam zhing na sems can ji snyed pa// de kun yongs su brtag pa bzung ste bdud gyur la// ba spu nyag re
las kyang de snyang sprul byas kyang// de dag kun gyis mkhas la bar chad bya mi nus// rgyu rnam bzhi yis byang chub sems dpa' mkhas stobs ldan// bdud bzhis thub par dka' zhing
bskyod par mi nus te// stong bar gnas dang sems can yongs su mi gtong dang/ ji skad smras bzhin byed dang bde gshegs byin rlabs can// de bzhin gshegs yus shes rab
tshu pha rol phyin pa 'di// 'chad tsho byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig mos byed cing// bsam ba dag pas bsgrub par mngon par brtson byed na// des pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la zhugs
rig bya// chos dbyings de bzhin nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur zhing// dper na bar snang sprin bzhin gnas pa med par gnas// rig sngags 'chang ba gnas med mkhar rgyu gnas 'dod ba//
sngags mthus dus min me tog ldan zhing byin gyis rlob// de ltar sbyod pa byang chub sems dpa' mkhas gsal ba// rtogs par byed dang sangs rgyas chos rnams dmigs mi 'gyur//
'chad par byed dang chos 'dod lta bar byed ma dmigs/ 'di ni zhi 'dod yon tan dga' ba'i gnas pa yin// dgra bcom rnam thar de bzhin gshegs kyi ma gtogs par// gnas pa
watsab+ha 'di ni nyan thos rang rgyal 'byas pa yi// gnas pa zhi ba'i ting 'dzin rab zhi bde ldan pas// ji sAng kun gyi mchog dang gong na med pa yin/ 'dab chags mkhar la gnas kyang nga
bar 'gyur ma yin// nyan chun gnas kyang 'tshubs de 'chi ba med// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan stobs dag gis// pha rol son pa stong gnas mya ngan 'da' mi
'gyur// sems can kun gyi yon tan mchog tu 'gro ba dang// sangs rgyas ye shes mchog tu rmad byung mchog reg dang// chos kyi spyin pa rab mchog dam pa sbyin 'dod gang/
phanamadzad rnams kyi gnas mchog 'di la bden par gyis// bslab pa 'di ni 'dren pas bslab pa yongs brjod pa// bslab pa ji snyad kun gyi mchog dang gong na med/ mkhas pa gang
shig bslab kun pha rol 'gro 'dod pas// sangs rgyas bsub pa shes rab pha rol phyin 'di slob/ 'dan chos gter mchog dang chos mdzod dam pa yin/ sangs rgyas rigs yin na
ba'i bde dang skyid pa'i mdzod// 'das dang ma byon phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten mgon po rnams // de dag 'di las 'khrungs kyang chos dbyis phrad mi 'gyur// shing dang 'bras bu ma de
nags tshal ji snyed pa// de dag thams cad sa la yang dag 'byung zhing 'thon/ 'on kyang sa la zad pa med cing 'brel ba med// yongs su mi nyams rnam par mi rtog skye ba med/ sangs
rgyas sras dang nyan thos rang rgyal lha rnams dang// 'gro ba kun gyi bde skyed chos rnams ji snyed pa// de kun shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog las byung// shes rab
nams kyang zad pa medacing 'phel ba med// sems can tha ma 'bring dang mchog gyur ji snyed pa// de kun ma rig las byung bde bar gshegs pas gsungs// rkyenaM rnams tshogs nas
sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor rab tu 'byung// ma rig 'khrul 'khor de ni zad med 'phel ba med// ye shes tshul sgo thabs dang rtsa ba ji snyad ba// de kun shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog las
byung rkye na rnams tshogs nas las kyi 'khrul 'khor rab tu 'byung/ shes rab pha rol phyin la bod med 'thal ba med// byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig rten cing 'brel 'byul//
skyo mad zad pa med pa shes pas 'dis shes te// nyi ma sprin med 'od zer 'gro bas mun bsal ltar// ma rig thibs po bcom nas rang byung thob par 'gyur// mthu chen ldan pa bsam
gtan bzhis kyang gnas byed pa/ rten par byed ba ma yin gnas par byed pa med// 'on kyang bsam gtan yan lag bcas pa bzhi po 'dis// byang chub sems dpa' mchog thob pa
yi rten du 'gyur// shes rab mchog thob bsam gtan dag la gnas pa ni// gzugs med ting 'dzan dam pa bzhi yapa nyams su myong// bsam gtana'ang dag byang chub dam pa/
mthas/ mchog la phan// byang chub sems dpa' brag pa brang phyir slob ba min// 'di ni yon tan sogs pa'i ngo mtshar rmad byung ste// bsam gtan ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas mtshan
mad[;]de la gnas rnams gal te lus ni zhig gyur na// bsam pa ji bshin 'dod pa'i khams su yang skya 'o// dpar na 'dzam gling mi zhig sngon chad lha yul gyi// lha yi grong
khyer mchog tu ma phyin phyis song ste// de ni yongs su bzung ba'i yul de rnams mthong nas/ phyir 'dir 'ong bar gyuran chags par mi byed ltar// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa'i
yon tan mchog 'chang ba// rnal 'byor brtson de bsam gtan ting 'dzin 4 la gnas nas/ phyir yapa 'dod pa'i khams su gnas te chags pa med// chu yi brlabazhin du byis pa'i
tshes mi gnas// bdag nyid chen po soms can yongs su smin bya dang// zhing sbyong pha rol phyin rdzogs don byed kho nar zad// byang chub yon tan pha rol phyin nyams 'gyur song zhes//
gzugs med khams su skye ba don du gnyer mi byed// dper na mi zhig rin chen gter rnams snod gyur nas// de la 'dod pa'i blo na skyud par ma byas la// des kyang dus gzhan zhig
na de dag yongs blangs shing/ blangs nas khyim du song ste chags par mi byed ltar// de bzhin sems dpa' mkhas pa dga' ba dang/ bde sbyin bsam gtan ting 'dzin zhi 'bazhi thob nas//
bsam gtan bde ldan bsam gtan ting 'dzin thob btung ste// 'gro la snying brtser ldan pa phyir yang 'dod khams 'jug/ gal te byang chub sems dpa'i ting
'dzin bsam gtan gnas// dgra bcom rang rgyal theg par 'dod pa'i blo sbyang na// mnyam par ma gzhag rgod cing sems g.yengs gyur pa ste// sangs rgyas yon tan yongs nyams
mnyan pa gru zhig bzhin// gzhan yang gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri dang ro// reg dang 'dod ba'i yon tan lnga la brtson gyur kyang// dgra bcom rang rgyal theg bral byang chub sems dga'
na: dpa' bo rtag tu mnyam gzhag yin par shes par bya// sems can gang zag gzhan phyir sems dpa' rnam dag pa// brtson 'grus pha phol phyin la mngon brtson rnam par sbyod//
dper na bran mo chu chun dbang med jo bo'i dbang// de bzhin dpa' rnams sems can kun gyi dbang gis 'gro// sbyo ba byas sam 'on te rtag tu brdegs kyang rung// bran mo jo bo la ni
zlog tshig mi sgra yi/ 'di yis bdaganA gsad bar 'gyur du 'ong snyam nas// shin tu skrag pa'i yid kyis 'jigs bcas zil gyis gnon// de bzhin byang chub ched du byang chub mchog
zhugs pa/ 'gro ba kun la bran gyur bzhin du gnas par bya// 'di las byang chub 'thob cing yon tan rdzogs bar 'gyur rtswa dang shing las mkhyung bas ni de nyid srog/ bdag gi bde/
'a0/ba btang nas re ba med sems kyis// sems can gzhan gyi dgos la nyin mtshon mngon par brtson// bu gnyis pa la man rim gro byed pa ltar/ bsam pa thag pas rnam par skyo med gnas
par gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig yun ring 'khor 'dod cing// sems can don dang zhing sbyong brtson pa'i rnal 'byor pa// skyo ba'i blo ni rdul tsam skyed par mi 'gyur na//
nga ni brtson 'grus pha rol phyin ldan g.yeng ba med// byang chub sems dpa' mi mkhas bskal pa bye bar bgrang// gal terang bar 'du shes sdug bsngal byang chub sgrub// yang dgachos
sgrub byed tshe yun ring sdug bsngal 'gyur// des na brtson 'grus pha rol phyin nyams le lo can// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed dang po nas bzung ste/ byang chub bla na med pa thob par
gyur kyi bar// nyin mtshan gcig tsam dun yid la sems byed na/ mkhas pa gsal bas brtson 'grus brtsams par rig par bya// gal te 'ga' zhig 'di skad ra rab ri bshig pa'i
rjes la byang chub thob par 'gyur zhes smra ba las// ci ste skyo ba'i blo skyed tshad kyang sems byed na// de tshe byang chub sems dpa' de lor gyur pa yin// ci ste de ni 'di rtsam tshod lta dka'
sems// skad cig tsam la ri rab thal bar rlag sems skyed/ byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pas brtson 'grus btsugs pa ste/ dang por che blogs 'dren ba'i byang chub mchog thob 'gyur/
'gro ba yongs su smin par byas nas don bya zhes// gal te lus dang ngag dang yid kyis brtson byed na// bdag tu 'du shes gnas pas le lor gyur pa ste//
za thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la ring 'gyur gnam sa bzhin// gang tshe lus dang sems dang sems can 'du shes med/ 'du shes rnam par lag nas gnyis su medachos spyod/ 'di ni byang
chub zhi ba mims mchog 'dod pa// brtson 'grus pha rol phyin ces phan pa mdzad pas gsungs// gal te gzhan las ngan brjod tshig rtsub thos gyur na// bdag bde yin zhes byang chub
sems dpa' mkhas pa dga'// sus smras sus thos gang gis gang zhig gang gi phyir// bzod pa'i pha rol phyin mchog ldan pa mdzangs pa yin// byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig 'bod/
pa'i legs chos ldan// gang zhig stong gsum rin chen bkang ste 'jig rten mkhyen// sangs rgyas rnams dang dgra bcom rang rgyal phul byas pa'i// sbyin pa'i phung pos de la bsod
nams char mi phod// bzod la gnas pa'i lus ni yongs su dag 'gyur te// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan dang mthu stobs pa mtha' yas// sems can rnams la chos rab stong pa sgrog par
byang[}]'di ni bgrod ldan de la 'gro ba dgara'agyur mkhas// gal te sems can la las tsan dan phur ma blas// rab gus byang chub sems dpa' la ni nyug byed la// gzhan zhig
ba/ ma mdag mgo la 'thor byed gnyis ka la// de yis mnyam zhing snyogs pa'i yid n bskyed par bya// byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pas de ltar bzod byas nas/ sems bskyed de ni byang
chub mchog tu yongs bsngos nas// dpa' bo 'jig rten kun la bzod bas dgra bcom dang// rang rgyal sems can khams kyi ji snyed hril gyis gnon// bzod byed 'di snyam du yang sems
ni bskyed byas te// sems dmyal dud 'gro gshin rje'i 'jig rten sdug bsngal mang/ da'adod pa'i yon tan rgyu yis dbang med gnod myong na// byang chub ched du ci phyir da bzod mi bya snyam//
lcag dbyug mtshon dang bsad dang bcing dngabarjed pa dang/ mgo gcod pa dang rna ba rkang lag sna gtsad dang/ 'jig rten sdug bsngal ji sAd bdag gis bzod snyam pa/ byang chub sems
dpa' bzod pa'i pha rol phyin la gnas// tshul khrims kyis ni zhi ba 'dod rnams 'phags par 'gyur// stobs bcu'i spyod yul gnas shing tshul khrims nyams pa med// sdom pa'i bya
ba ji snyed kun gyi rjes su 'jug/ sems can kun la phan phyir de yang byang chub sngo/ gal te rang rgyal dgra bcom byang chub reg 'dod na// tshul khrims 'chal nying mi mkhas de bzhin spyod
pa nyams// ci ste byang chub zhi ba mchog tu yongs sngon// 'dod yon brtson yang tshul khrims pha rol phyin la gnas// chos gang des pa'i byang chub yon tan 'byupa'agyur ba// de ni
ma/ @#// yon tan chos ldan rnams kyi tshul khrims don// chos gang phan byed rnams kyi byang chub yongasanyams pa// 'di ni tshul khrims 'chal ces rnam par 'dren pas
zagasungs// gal te byang chub sems dpa' 'dod yon lnga spyod kyang// sangs rgyas chos dang 'phags pa'i dge 'dun skyabs song ste// sangs rgyas 'grub bya snyam du kun mkhyen yid
byed na// mkhas pas tshul khrims pha rol phyin gnas rig par bya/ (gal te bskal pa bye bar dge ba'i las lam bcu// spyod kyang rang rgyal dgra bcom nyid la 'dod skyed na// de
tsho tshul khrims skyon byung tshul khrims nyams pa yin// sems bskyod da na pas pham pas kyang shin tu lci// tshul khrims srung zhing byang chub mchog tu yongs sngo la// de yis rlom sems
rdzo med cing bdag bstod mi byed la// nga yi 'du shes sems can 'du shes yongs su spus/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims pha rol phyin gnas brjod// gal te byang chub sems
dpa'i rgyal ba'i lam spyod pa// sems can 'di dag khrims ldan 'di dag khrims 'chal ces// snatshogs 'du shes zhugs pa shin tu tshul khrims 'chal// tshul khrims nyams shing de
la yongs dag tshul khrims med// gang la bdag gi 'du shes sems can 'du shes med// 'du shes 'dod chags bral la sdom min ga la yod// gang la sdom dang sdom pa ma yin rlom
ma/ sems med/ 'di ni tshul khrims sdom par rnam par 'dren pas gsungs// sogs can dag pa gang zhig de ltar khrims ldan pa// sdug dang mi sdug kun la lta ba med pa yin//
mgo dang rkang lag gtong zhing zhum pa'i sems kyang mad/ dbadog pa thams cad gtong zhing rtag tu zhen pa med// chos rnams rang bzhin bdag med ya ma brlar shes nas// bdag gi
sha yang gtong la zhum pa'i sems med na// de tshe phyi rol dngos po gtong ba smos ci dgos// gal te ser sna byed pa de ni gnas med do// bdag tu 'du shes dngos la bdag gir 'an
pas chags// blun po rnams la gtong ba'i blo lta gal yod// ser sna can ni yi dgas gnas su skye bar 'gyur// nyi ste mir skyes na yang de tshe dbul por 'gyur// de tshe byang
chub sems dpa' sems can dbul shes nas// gdong la mos par 'gyur zhing rtag tu lhug par gtong// gling bzhi legs par brgyan pa mchil ma'i thal pa 'dra// byin nas
dga' bar 'gyur gyi gling thob de ltar min// byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa gsal ba srid gsum gyi// sems can ji snyed de dag kun la sbyin pa 'di// byin par gyur cig
snyam du bsams nas sbyin gyur la// de yang 'gro ba'i don phyir byang chub mchog tu bsngo// sbyin pa byin nas dngos la gnas par byed pa med// de ni nam du'ang rnam par smin la re ba
@#/ mad: de ltar gtong ba mkhas pa thams cad gtong ba ste// chung du btang la mang po dpag tu med par 'gyur// srid pa gsum na sems rgyun ma lus ji snyed
yongs su brtag pa bzung ste de dag thams cad kyis// 'jig rtenamakhyen pa sangs rgyas dgra bcom rang rgyal la// bskal pa mtha' yas sbyin byin nyan thos legs tsho la na//
byang chub sems dpar mkhas pa thabs mkhas gang zhig gis// de dag bsod nams bya ba'i dngos la yi rangs nas// sems can don du byang chub mchog rab yongs bsngo na// yo=

su rtogs pas 'gro ba thams cad bril gyis non/ su spro bas 'gro ba thams cad 'ba' sems pa sa glel gyis nyon// nor bu mching bu'i phung po chen po gyur pa yang// rin chen be zlarlagacig de kun hril gyis

gnon// de bzhin 'gro kun sbyin pa'i phung ba nas sems pas la gi po rgya chen kun/ gal te bong bu snams pas 'gro la smras/ gal te byang chub sems dpas 'gro la sbyar byas nas me drags 'gro ba gcod/ rdzas masar
pa'am a ma pa 'od ldan zla dkyil yar gyi ngo bzhin no/ de las dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen 'phel 'gyur te// sprin med 'od ldan zla dkyil yar gyi ngo bzhan na/ byang chub sa/ dbul ba dang ni de
bzhin nyon mongs thams cad gcod// spyod tshe longs spyod mtha' yas rgyas pa thob par 'gyur// sbyin pas sdug bsngal gyur pa'i sems can yongs smin byed/ khrims kyis dud
'gro'i 'gro ba du ma'i ngo bo dang/ ma 'or brgyad sbyong do yas dal bu rtag tu rnyed// bzed pas gzugs bzang dam pargyu chan thob gyur te// gser mdog sdug cing 'gro bas blta
ba'i 'os su 'gyur brtson 'grus kyis ni dkar po'i yon tan 'grub mi 'gyur/ ye shes mthar yas rgyal ba'i bang mdzod rnyed par 'gyur// bsam gtan gyis ni 'dod pa'i yon
tan smad pa 'dor// rig dang mngon par shes dang ting 'dzin mngon par sgrub// shes rab kyis ni chos kyi rang bzhin yongs shes nas// khams gsum ma lus pa las yang dag 'das
bar 'gyur// mi yi khyu mchog 'khor la rin chen bsor byas nas/[“ ]/sdug bsngal zad par bya phyir 'gro la chos kyang ston// chos 'di yongs rdzogs byas nas byang chub sems dpa' de//
yongs dag zhing dang sems can dag pa yongs su 'an// sangs rgyas rgyu dang ngos kyi rgyud kyang yongs su 'dzin// de bzhin dge 'dun rgyud dang chos kun yongs su 'dzin// 'gro ba'i nad
gso mdzad pa sman pa'i mcho ga gyur pas// shes rab bstan pa byang chub lam ldan 'di gsungs de// ming ni yon tan rin chen sdud pa byang chub lam// lam 'di sems can rnams
kyis thob bar bya phyir bshad// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdud pa tshigs su'acad pa rdzogs so// gsar 'gyur gtan la phab pa//
mtsha @#/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya badzratshe de kAn ma pradz+nyA pA ra mi tAnA ma mahA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdo rje gcod pa zhes
zabya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan du
rgyuyod pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na// dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang/ byang chub sems dpa'
sams dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe/ sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzod bsnams nas/
mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen bor bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir gshegs nas/ bsod snyoms kyi zhal
zas mjug tu gsol te/ zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzad/ lhung bzed dang chos gos bzhaganas/ zhabs bsil te gdan bshams pa la skyil mo krung bcas nas sku drang por bsrang ste/
dran pamangon du bzhag nas bzhugs so// de nas dge slong mang po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/
'kha0 bom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba bsanas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// yang de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go/ de nas tshe dang
ldan pa rab 'byor stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gnyig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pan+ti lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba/
btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzodrags pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la phan gdags pa'i dam pa ji snyed pas phan btags pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis//
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la yongs su gtad pa'i dam pas yongs su gtad pa na/ bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to// bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to//
yacom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pas ji ltar gnas par bgyi/ ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ ji ltar sems rab tu gzung bar bgyi/ de skad
ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor legs so legs so// rab 'byor de de bzhin no//
de de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la phan gdags pa'i dam pas phan btags so// de bzhin
gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la yongs su gtad pa'i dam pas yongs su gtad do// rab 'byor de'i phyir nyon la legs par rab tu yid la zung shig dang/
(byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pas/ ji ltar gnas par bya ba dang/ ji ltar bsgrub par bya ba dang/ ji ltar sems rab tu gzung bar bya ba ngas khyod la bshad
do bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol nas/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad nas bka' stsal to//
rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pas 'di snyam du/ bdag gis sems can ji tsam sems can du bsdus pa/ sgo nga las skyes pa rnam/ mngal
las skyes pa 'as/ drod gsher las skyes pa 'am/ rdzus te skyes pa 'am/ gzugs can nam/ gzugs med pa 'am/ 'du shes can nam/ 'du
shes med pa 'am/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min nam/ sems can gyi khams ji tsam sems can du gdags pas btags pa de dag thams cad phung po lhag ma med pa'imya/
ngan las 'das pa'i dbyis su yongs su mya ngan las bzla'o// de ltar sems can tshad med pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang/ sems can gang yang yongs su mya ngan las 'das/
par gyur pa med do snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o// de rgyu'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dang 'a sems can du 'du shes 'jug na// de byang chub sems dpa3
zhes mi bya ba'i phyir ro// de phyi'i phyir zhen/ rab 'byor gang sems can du 'du shes 'jug pa 'am/ srog tu 'du shes pa 'am/ gang zag tu 'du shes 'jug na/ de byang
chub sems dpa' zhes mi bya ba'i phyir ro// yang rab 'byor byang chub sems dpas dngos po la mi gnas par sbyin pa sbyin no// nu la'ang mi gnas par sbyin pa sbyin no// gzugs
la'ang mi gnas par sbyin pa sbyin no// sgra dang/ dri dang/ ro dang/ reg bya dang/ chos la'ang mi gnas par sbyin pa sbyin no/ rab 'byor tunas mtshan mar 'du shes
pa la'ang mi gnas pa de ltar byang chub sems dpa/sa sbyipa sbyin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' gang mi gnas par sbyin pa sbyin pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni/
rab 'byor tshad gzung bar bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di jisnyam du sems shar phyogs kyi nam mkha'i tshad gzung bar zla ba 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa
bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de bzhin du lho dang/ nub dang/ byang dang/ steng dang//
zacog dang/ phyogs mtshams dang/ phyogs bcu'i nam mkha' tshad gzung bar bla snyam mam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//
[>bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gang mi gnas par sbyin pa sbyin pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung bo'ang tshad gzung bar bya ba ma yin no//
rab 'byor 'di snyam du soms/ mtshan phun sum tshogs pas de bzhin gshegs par blta ma/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/
mtshan phun sum tshogs pa de bzhin gshegs par lta'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan phun sum tshogs par gang gsungs pa de nyid/ mtshan phun sum
tshogs pa ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor ji tsam
du mtshan phun sum tshogs pa de tsam du brdzun no// ji tsam du mtshan nyan sum tshogs pa med pa de tsam du brdzun te/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la mtshan dang mtshan ma med par blta'o/
de skad ces paka' stsal ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab sbyor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la dam
pa'i chos rab tu rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ba na/ sems can gang la la dag 'di lta bu'i mdo snga'i tshig bshad pa 'di la yang dag par 'du shes skyed par 'gyur ba lta mchis sam//
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor khyod 'di skad du ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la dam pa'i chos rab tu rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ba na/ sems can gang la la dag
'di lta bu'i mdo sde'i tshig bshad pa 'di la yang dag par 'du shes skyed par 'gyur ba mchis sam zhes zer cig/ yang rab 'byor ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos rab tu
rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ba na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ yon tan dang ldan pa// shes rab dang ldan pa dag 'byung ste/ rab
'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang/ sangs rgyas gcig la khasAn bkur byas pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas gcig la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa ma yin gyi/
rab 'byor sangs rgyas brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkur byas shing/ sangs rgyas brgya stong du ma la dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag byung ngo//
mtshan@#/ gang dag 'di lta bu'i mdo sde'i tshig bshad pa 'di la sems dad ba cig tsag redabar 'gyur ba de dag ni/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen to// dga' bya
de dag ni de bzhinagashegs pas gzigs te/ rab 'byor sems can de dag thams cad ni bsod nams kyi phung po dbag tu da ba skyed cing rab tu sdud par 'gyur ro// de 'i phyir zhe na//
rab 'byor byung chub sems dwaba' sems dpa' chen bo de dag ni bdag tu 'du shes 'jug par mi 'gyur zhing/ sems can du 'du shes pa ma yin/ srog tu 'du shes ba yani/ gang
zla brag tu 'du shes 'jug par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag chos su 'du shes pa dang/ chos med par yang 'du shes mi 'jug ste//
de dag ni 'du shes dang/ 'du shesamad par yang 'jug bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag chos su 'du
shes 'jugan/ de nyid de dag gi bdag tu 'dzin par 'gyur zhing/ sems can du 'dzin pa dang/ srog tu 'dzin pa dang/ gang zag tu 'dzin bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ gal
te chos med bas 'du shes 'gana'ang de nyidade dag gibadag tu 'dzin bar 'gyur zhing/ sems can du 'dzin pa dang/ srog tu 'dzin pa dang/ gang zag tu 'dzin bar 'gyur ba'i phyi
[d ]ro[}]de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yang rab 'byor byang chub sems dpas chos kyang log par gzung bar mi bya ste/ chos ma yin pa'ang mi gzung ba'i phyir ro// de bas na de las dgongs te/
de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi rnam grangs gzings lta bu r shes pa rnams kyis chos rnams kyang spang bar bya na/ chos ma yin ba rnams lta ci smos shes gsungs so// gzhan yang bcom
ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor 'di risnyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pas gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs

'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/ de bzhin gshegs

sa/ chos ma mchis pa'ang ma lags pa'i slad du'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'phags pa'i gang zag rnams ni 'dus ma bgyisakyis rab tu phye ba'i slad du'o//

'byor gyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'dus mang lags so// bde bar gshegs pa mang lags te// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de gzhi de las bsod nams kyi
phung po mang du bskyed do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bsod nams kyi phung po nyid phung bo ma mchis pa'i slad du ste/ des na de bzhin gshegs pas bsod nams
kyi phung po zhes gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
khams 'di rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tugang bar byas te sbyin pa sbyin pa bas/ gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las than tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam bzung nas/

de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni 'di las byung ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang
'di las skyes pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhen/ rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams shes bya ba/ sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag med par re bzhin
gshegs pas gsungs pa'i phyir te/ des na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams shes bya'o// rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ rgyun du zhugs pa 'di snyam du/ bdag gis
rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo snyam du sems sam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das den ma lags so// di ru'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni
la'ang zhugs pa ma mchis pa'i slad du ste/ des na rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bgyi'o// gzugs la'ang ma zhugs/ sgra la ma lags/ dri la ma lags/ ro wa ma lags/
regacul ma lags/ chos la'ang ma zhugs te/ des na rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te rgyun du zhugs pa de 'di snyam du/ bdag gis rgyun du
zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo snyam du sems par gyur na/ de nyid de'i bdag tu 'dzin par 'gyur ro// sems can du 'dzin pa dang/ srog tu 'dzin pa dang/

phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo snyam du sems sam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhen/ gang lan cig phyir 'ong
ba'i chos de gang yang ma mchis pa'i slad du ste/ des nalamug phyir 'ong bzhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems//
phyir mi 'ong ba 'di snyam du/ bdag gis phyir mi 'ong pa'i 'bras bu thob bo snyam du sems sam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// de ci'i
slad du zhe na/ gang phyir mi 'ong ba nyid du zhugs pa'i chos de gang yang ma mchis pa'i slad du ste/ des na phyir mi 'ong ba zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ yang dgra bcom pa 'di snyam du/ bdag gis dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo snyam du sems sam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol ba// bcomaldan
'das de ni ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe// dgra bcom pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos de gang yang ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te dgra bcom pa 'di snyam du/
bdag gis dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo snyam du sems par gyuran/ de nyid de'i bdag tu 'dzin par 'gyur ro// sems can du 'dzin pa dang/ srog tu 'dzin pa dang/ gang
ga tu 'dzin par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan

'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming su 'gas/ ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ de skad kyis gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis:
bzhi/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor chos kyi rnam grangs 'dapeshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ste/ 'di de ltar nga zhig/ de ci'i phyir zhen//

ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pas gang gsungs pat+ti chos de gang yang yod dam/ yang rab 'byor gyis gsol pa// btses ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas gang

chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sngon nam yang ma thos so// bcom ldan 'das mdo sde bshad pa 'di la/ gang dag yang dag par 'du shes skyed par 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ni ngo mtshar rab dang

de dag ni ngo mtshar rab dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs te/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam pa gang dag de

de bzhin gshegs pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de nyid pha rol tu phyin pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'abyor gang gi tshe ka ling ka'i rgyal pos pa'i yan lag dang nying lag
rnams bcad par gyur pa de'i tshe/ ngal bdag tu 'du shes sam/ sems can du 'du shes sam/ srog tu 'du shes sam/ gang zag tu 'du shes kyang ma byung zhing/
