'am/ sems kyi 'du shes kyang 'byung ba'i phyir ro// sems nyan du 'du shes pa dang/ srog tu 'du shes pa dang/ gang zag tu 'du shes pa byung na/ de'i tshe gnod sems kyi 'du
shes kyang 'byung ba'i phyir ro// rab 'abyor ngas mngon par shes te 'das pa'i dus na tshe rabs lnga brgyar bzod pa sna ba zhes bya ba'i drang srong du gyur pa de na yang/ ngal bdag tu 'du/
shes ma byung/ soms rgyun du 'du shes pa dang/ srog tu 'du shes pa dang/ gang zag tu 'du shes ma byung ngo// rab 'byor de lta bas na byang chub sems dang la soms dpa'/
chen pos 'du shes thams cad rnam par spangs te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya'o// gzugs la'ang mi gnas par sems bskyod par bya'o//
sgra dang/ dri dang/ ro dang/ regabya dang/ chos la'ang mi gnas par sems bskyed par bya'o// chos med pa rang gi gnas par sems bskyed par bya'o// nu la 'angami/
gnas par sems bskyed par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gnas pa gang yin pa de nyid mi gnas pa'i phyir te/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs pas 'di skad du/ byang chub sems dpas
mi gnas par sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o// zhes gsungs so// yang rab 'byor byang chub sems dpas 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir sbyin pa yongs su gtang bar bya'o// soms
can du 'du shes pa gang yin pa de nyid kyang 'du shes med pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pas sems can thamasacad ces gang gsungs pa de dag nyid kyang med pa'o// de ci'i
za phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs ba ni yang dag par gsungs pa/ bden pa gsung ba/ de bzhin nyid gsung ba ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni mdor ba de bzhin nyid gsung
bloba'i phyir ro// yang rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs bas/ chos gang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa 'am/ bstan pa de la ni bden pa'ang med/ brdzun pa'ang yod do//
rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na mig dang ldan pa'i mi zhig mun par thugs nas 'ang mi mthong ba de bzhin du/ gang dngos por lhung bas sbyin pa yongs su gtang ba'i byang chub sems
dpar blta'o// rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na nam langs te nyi ma shar nas mig dang ldan pa'i mis gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs dag mthong ba de bzhin du/ gang dngos por ma
lhung bas sbyin pa longs su gtong ba'i byang chub sems dpar blta'o// rab 'byor rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di len pa dung/ 'dzin pa dang/
klog pa dang/ kun chub par byed pa dang/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas
00 gzigs te/ sems can de dag thams cad ni bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa skyed par 'gyur ro// yang rab 'byor skyes pa 'am/ bud med gang zhig snga dro'i dus kyi tshe/
lus gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyad kyi lus yongs su gtong la/ byed kyi dus dang/ phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe'ang lus gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyad yongs su btang ste/ rnam grangs 'di lta bu r
bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du lus yongs su gtong ba bas/ gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mi spongan/ de nyid gzhi de las bsod nams ches mang du grangs med dpag
tu med pa bskyed na/ gang gis yi ger bris nas len pa dang/ 'dzin pa dang/ klog pa dang/ kun chub par byed pa dang/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston
pa lta ci smos/ rab 'byor chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab cing mtshungs pa med de/ 'di'i rnam par smin pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid du rig par bya'o// chos kyi rnam
grangs 'di'i theg pa mchog la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can rnamasakyi don dang/ theg pa phul du phyin pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir/ de bzhin
gshegs pas gsungs so// gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di len pa dang/ 'dzin pa dang/ klog po dang/ kun chub par byed pa dang/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag
bar pa tu ston ba dedag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas gzigs te/ sems can de dag thams cad na bsod nams kyi phung
zapo dpag tu med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// bsod nags kyi phung bo bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/ mtshungs pa med pa dang/ gzhal du med pa dang/ tshad med pa dang ldan par 'gyur te/
sems can de dag thams cad pa'i byang chub phrag ba la thogs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dman pa la mos pa rnams kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan par mi nus te/
bdag tu lta ba rnams kyis ma yin/ sems can du lta ba rnamasakyis ma yin/ srog tu lta ba rnams kyis ma yin/ gang zag tu lta ba rnams kyis mnyan pa dang/ blang ba dang/
gzung ba dang/ klog pa dang/ kun chub par byed mi nus te/ de na gnas pa'i phyir ro// yang rab 'byor sa phyogs gang namado sde 'di ston pa'i sa phyogs de lha dang/
mi dang/ lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mchod par 'os par 'gyur ro// sa phyogs de phyag bya bar 'os pa dang/ bskor ba bya bar 'os par yang 'gyur te/ sa phyogs
de mchod rten lta bu r 'gyur ro// rab 'byor rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag 'di lta bu'i mdo sde'i tshig 'di dag len pa dang/ 'dzin pa dang/ klog pa dang/ kun
sa0/ chub par byed pa de dag ni mnur bar 'gyur/ shin tu mnar bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sems can 'di dag tshe rabs snga ma'i mi dge ba'i las ngan song du skye bar/
'gyur ba gang dag byas pa dag tshe 'di nyid la mnar bus/ tshe rabs snga ma'i mi dag pa'i las de dag byang bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyang 'thob par 'gyur pa'i phyir ro// rab
'byor ngas mngon par shes te 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa 'i yang grangs med pan// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyi pha rol
gyi yang ches pha rol na/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dag byung ba ngas mnyes par byas te/ mnyes par byas nas thugs ma byung bar byas te/ rab 'byor
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ngas mnyes par byas nas/ thugs byung bar mi byas pa gang yin pa dang/ phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya tha mar gyur pa na/ mdo sde 'di len pa dang/
'dzin pa dang/ klog pa dang/ kun chub par byed pa gang yin pa las/ rab 'byor bsod nams kyi phungos 'di la bsod nams kyi lung po sngags brgya'ichar yang mi bod/stong gi cha dang/ brgya
stong gi cha dang/ grangs dang/ cha dang/ bgrang ba dang/ dpa dang/ blo dang/ rgyur yang mi bzod do// rab 'byor gal te de'i tshe rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi
mawa'u// bu mo dag bsod nams kyi phung po 'di nyid rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ba/ rigs kyi bu 'am[） ]rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po ngas brjod na/
bsams can rnams skyo skyo bor 'gyur/ sems 'khrugs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsam gyis mi khyab ste// 'di'i rnam par smin pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab
bar rig par bya'o// denas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs
pas ji ltar gnas bar bgyi/ ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ ji ltar sems rab tu gzung bar bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ]
rab 'abyor 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pas/ 'di snyam du bdag gis sems can thams cad phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i bya ngan las bzlas pa'i dbyings su
yongs su mya na las bzla'o// de ltar sems can yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang/ sems can gang yang yongs suman las bklas par gyur pa med snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o/
de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' soms than du 'du shes 'jugan/ byang chub sems dpo' nas mi bya gang zag gi bar du shes 'jugana'ang/
de byang chub sems dpa' zhes mi bya ba'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gdu byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa zhes bya ba'i chos de gang yang med pa'i phyire ro//
rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pamar me mdzad las/ gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
sangs rgyas pa'i chos de gang yang yod dam/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan/
'angs de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa mar mamadzad las/ gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i chos de gang yang ma mchis so//
de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no// de
bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa mar medamadzad las/ gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i chos gang yang med do// rab
'byor gal te de bzhin gshegs pas/ gang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i chos de 'ga' zhig yod par gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyis/ ngal bram
wa @#// the'i khye'u khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur rozhes lung mi ston pa zhig
na rab 'byor 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas/ gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i chos de gang yang med bas/ de'i
[$]phyir de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyis/ nga la bram ze'i khye'u khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dusan de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar
tshe 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgas yin pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gang la la
zhig 'di skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so
rdzo/ zhes zer na/ de log par smra ba yin no// de ci'i phyir zhen/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshags bas/ gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mangon par rdzogs par sangs
rgyas pa'i chos de gang yang med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa chos gang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de la bden pa'ang med/ brdzun pa'ang med/ de bas
ba00 na de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos shes gsung ngo// rab 'byor chos thams cad ces bya ba ni/ de dag thams cad chos med pa yin te/ des na chos
thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos shes bya'o// rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na mi zhig lus dang ldan zhing lus chen por gyur pa bzhin no// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
gyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas mi lus dang ldan zhing lus chen po zhes gang gsungs pa de/ de bzhin gshogs pas lus ma mchis par gsungs te/
nges na lus dang ldan zhing lus chen po zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ byang+gachub sems dpa' gang 'di skad du/ bdag
gis sems can rnams yongs su mya ngan las bzla'o zhes zeran/ de byang chub sems dpa' zhes mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gang byang chub sems dpa'azhes bya ba'i
chos de gang yang yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis rgasol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor de bas na de bzhin
gshegs pa chos thams cad ni sems can med pa// srog med pa/ gang zag med pa zhes gsung ngo// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' gangashig 'di skad du/ bdag gis zhing
bkod pa rnams bsgrub bo zhes zer na/ de'ang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o// de'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor zhing bkod pa rnams zhing bkod pa rnams shes khyab/
zani/ de bkod pa med par de bzhin gshegs las gsungs pa'i phyir te/ desan zhing bkod pa rnams shes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig chos rnamasan bdag med pa'o/
chos rnams ni bdag med pa'o zhes mos pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' zhes brjod/
do rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa lasha'i spyan sa' 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags te/ de bzhin/
gshegs pa la sha'i spyan mnga' 'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa la lha'i spyan mnga' 'am/ rab
'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags te/ de bzhin gshags pa la lha'i spyan ma'a'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji
snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa la shes rab kyi spyan mnga' 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la
wa/ shes rab kyi spyan mtha' 'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'du ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa la chos kyi spyan ma' 'am/ rab 'byob
gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la chos kyi spyan mnga' 'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji
snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa la sangs rgyas kyi sbyan ma' 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das de de ltar gas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la
sangs rgyas kyi spyan mnga' 'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di jisnyam du sems/ gang+gA'i klung gakyis ji snyed pa gang+gA'i klung lang de snyad du gyur la/
de dag gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gyur na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mang ba yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags te/ 'jig
rten gyi khams de'ang mang ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka3 stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag gi bsam pa tha dad pa'i
sems kyi rgyun sa rab tu shes so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sems kyi rgyun sems kyi rgyun ces bya ba ni/ de rgyun med par re bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i phyir te/
na@#// des na sems kyi rgyun ces bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'dus pa'i sems kyang dmigs su med/ ma 'ongs pa'i sems kyang dmigs su med/
nga ltar byung ba'i sems kyang dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'abyor 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna bdun gyis
yongs su gang bar byas te sbyin pa byin na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de gzhi de las bsod nams mang du bskyed dam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
'dus mang lags so//bde bar gshegs pa ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de gzhi de las bsod
nams kyi phung po mang du bskyod do// rab 'byor gal te bsod nams kyi phung por gyur na/ bsod nams kyi phung po bsod nams kyi phung po zhes de bzhin gshegs pa mi gsung ngo// rab
'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzugs kyi lus yongs su grub pas/ de nyashin gshegs par blta 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das de nam lags te/
gzugs kyi sku yongs su grub pas/ de bzhin gshegs par mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gzugasakyi sku yongs su grub pa/ gzugs kyi sku yongs/
bawa/ su rdzogs bzhes bgyi ba ni/ de yongs su grub ba ma mchis bar de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i slad du ste/ des na gzugs kyi sku yongs su grub pa zhes bgyi'o/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ mtshan phun sum tshogs pas de bzhin gshegs par blta'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol la//
bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te// mtshan phun sum tshogs pas de bzhin gshegs par mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan phun sum tshogs
par gang gsungs pa de mtshan phun sum tshogs pa mamachis par de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i slad du ste/ des na mtshan phun sum tshogs pa zhes bgyi'o/ bcos ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'du ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'di snyam du/ dras chos bstan to zhes dgongs so snyam na/ rab 'byor de ltaram blta ste/
de bzhin gshegs pas gang bstan pa'achos de gang yang med do// rab 'abyor su zhig 'di skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos bstan to zhes zeran/ rab 'byor de named pa dang/
log par zin pas de la skur par 'gyur ro// de'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos bstan pa zhes bya ba dmigs bar 'gyur pa'i chos bstan pa zhes bya ba de gang yang med pa'i phyir ro// denas
bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i dusan/ sems can gang dag 'di ltabu'i
chos bshad pa thos nas/ mngon par yid ches par 'gyur ba mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de dag ni sems can yang ma yin/ samasanyan
med pa'ang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sems can rnams shes bya ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas de dag sems can med bar gsungs pa'i phyir te/ des na
sems can rnams shes bya'o// rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pas gang bla na med pa yang dag par tshogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i
thA chos de gang yang yod dam/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis gsol pa ! bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas/ gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i chos de gang yang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ de chos cung zad kyang med cing mi
ngamigs te/ des na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'ibyang chub ces bya'o// yang rab 'byor chos de ni mnyam pa ste/ de la mi mnyam pa gang yang yod pas/ des na bla na med pa yang
'a0 dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces bya'o// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni bdag med pa dang/ sems can med pa dang/ srog med pa dang/ gang zag mad bar
mnyam pa ste/ dge ba'i chos thams cad kyis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// rab 'byor dge ba'i chos rnams dge ba'i chos rnams shes bya ba ni/ de dag de bzhin gshegs pas
chos med pa nyid du gsung te/ des na dge ba'i chos rnams shes bya'o// yang rab 'byor rigasakyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen bo 'jig
rten gyi khams na/ 'i rgyal po ri rab dag ji snyed yod pa de tsam gyi na po che sna bdun gyi phung po mngon par bsdus te sbyin pa byin pa bas/ gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
las phan tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa tsam bzung nas/ gzhan dag la'ang bstan na/ rab 'byor bsod nams kyi phung po 'di la/ bsod nams kyi phung po snga ma des brgya'i
char yang nye bar mi phod pa nas/ rgyu'i bar du'ang bar mi bzod do// rab 'byor 'di jisnyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'di snyam du/ pas sems can rnams bkrol lo
zhes dgos snyam na/ rab 'byor de de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas ga ga krol ba'i sems can de dag gang yang med pa'i phyir ro// rab
'byor gal te de bzhin gshegs pas sems can gang la la zhig bkrol bar gyur na/ de nyid de bzhin gshegs pasab dag tu 'dzin par 'gyur/ sems can du
'dzin ba dang/ srog tu 'dzin ba dang/ gang zag tu 'dzin par 'gyur go// rab 'byor bdag tu 'dzin ces bya ba ni// de 'dzin ba med par de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs na/
ba de'ang byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis gzung ngo// rab 'byor byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams shes bya ba ni/ de dag skye bo med par de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs te/ des na byis
pa so so'askyo bo rnams shes bya'o// rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ mtshan phun sum tshogs pas/ de bzhin gshegs par blta 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/

'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po'ang de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur te/ de bas na mtshan phun sum tshogs pas/ de bzhin gshegs bar mi blta'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la//

bar mi blta'o// denas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tsho tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// gang dag nga la gzugs su mthong// gang dag nga la sgrar shes pa/ lag
bar spong bas zhugs pa ste// skye bo de dag nga mi mthong// sangs rgyas rnams ni chos nyid lta// 'dren pa rnams ni chos kyi sku// chos nyid rig par bya min pas// de ni
rnam par shes mi nus// rab 'byor 'di jisnyam du sams/ mtshan phun sum tshogs pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes
'dzin na/ rab 'byor khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ rab 'byor mtshan phun sum tshogs pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/
blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa med do// rab 'byor 'di snyam du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyis chos
la zhig rnam par bshig gam/ chad par btags pa sAm du 'dzin na/ rab 'byor de ltar mi blta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyis/
chos gang yang rnam par bshig pa'am/ chadu bar btags pa med do// yang rab 'byor lags kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis 'jig rten gyi khams

zegang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu gang bar byas te sbyin pa sprin pa bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang zhige chos rnams dpag tu med cing skye ba med pa la bzod pa thoban/
de nyid gzhi de las bsod nams kyi phung po ches mang du bskyed do// yang rab 'byor byang chub sems dpas bsod nams kyi phung po yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas bsod nams kyi phung po yongs su gzung bar mi bgyi lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
yongs su gzung mod kyi/ leg par mi gzung ste/ desan yongs su gzung ba zhes bya'o// rab 'abyor gang la la zhig 'di skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa bzhud dam/ byon
tam bzhes sam/ bzhugs sam/ mnalamadzad do zhes de skad zer na/ des ngas bshad pa'i don mi shes so// de ci'i phyizhen/ rab 'byor de bzhin
gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni gar yang ma bzhud/ gang nas kyang ma byon pa'i phyir te/ des na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes bya'o// yang rab
'byor rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis stong gsumagyi stong chen po'a'ajig rten gyi khams na sa'i rdul rnams ji snyed yod pa dag/ 'di lta ste/ dper na rdul phra rab kyi tshogs
bzhin phyi mar byas na/ rab 'byor 'di drisAm du sems/ rdul phra rab kyi tshogs de mang ba yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags te/
rdul phra rab kyi tshogs de mang ba lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gal te tshogs shig mchis par gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rdul phra rab kyi tshogs shes
bka' mi stsal pa'i slad du'o// de'i slad du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rdul phra rab kyi tshogasashes gang gsungs pa de/ tshogs ma mchis par de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs/
pa'i slad du ste/ des na rdul phra rab kyi tshogs shes bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams shes gang gsungs pa de/ khams ma mchis par
de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs te/ des na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams shes bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gal te khams shige mchis pa
gyur na/ de nyid ril por 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i slad du'o// de bzhin gshegs pas ril por 'dzin par gsungs pa de/ 'dzin pa ma mchis par de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs te/
des na la dor 'dzin pa zhes bgyi'o/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor la por 'an pa nyid thi snyad de/ chos don brjod du med pa yin/
za/ de'ang byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis gsung ngo// rab 'byor gang la la zhig 'di skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pas bdag tu lta bar gsus/ de bzhin gshegs pas sems nyan
du lta ba dang/ gang zag tu lta bar gsungs sozhes zeran/ rab 'khyer de'ang yang dag par lta ba yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de na ma lags so//
bde bar gshegs ba de ni ga lags so// de ci'i slad du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas bdag tu lta bar gsungs pa de/ lta ba ma mchis par de bzhin gshegs pas
gsus ba'i slad du ste/ des na bdag tu lta ba zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa
rnams kyis chos thams cad shes par bya'o// blta bar bya'o// gos par byas te nyin s chos su 'du shes pa la'ang mi gnas pa de ltar mos par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/
rab 'byor chos su 'du shes shes bya ban/ 'du shes med par de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i phyir te/ des na chos su 'du shes shes bya'o// yang rab 'byor byang chub sems
[z/]dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa dag rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu gang bar byas te sbyin pa byin pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi
bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las tha na tshig lan pa 'i tshigs su bcad pa tsug blangs nas 'dzin tam/ klog ga/ kun chub par byed dam/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya
cher rab tu ston na/ de nyid gzhi de las bsod nams mang du grangs med dbag tumed pa bskyed do// ji ltar yang dag par rab tu ston rgyun// jiltar yang dag par rab tu ston pa de bzhin
du ste des na yang dag par rab tu ston pa zhes bya'o// skar ma rab rib mar me dang// sgyu ma zil pa chu bur dang// rmi lam glog dang sprin lta bu r// 'dus byas de ltar blta
bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ gnas brtan rab 'byor dang/ dge slong de dag dang/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang/
'khor bzhi po dge slong dpa/ dge slong ma dang/ dge bsnyen dang/ dge bsnyen ma de dag dang/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin dang/ dri zar bcas pa'i
'jig rten yi rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsus pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdo ljagacod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i
[ag]// mdo rdzogs so//// @#// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya pradzA pA ra mi tAnaya ashanI/ bod skad du//
za 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul brgya lnga bcu ba// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu na pa la phyag 'tshol la/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/
skyobcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs bya thams cad kyi mchog dang mkhyen pa'i bye brag rnam pa tha dad pa dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che thams cad kyicod pan gyis khams gsum
du dbang bskur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa// rnal 'byor can chen po'i dbang phyug/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams
cad kyi mnyam pa nyid thugs su chud pa/ snatshogs kyi bya ba mdzad de/ ma lus pa na sems can gyi khams lus ba med pa/ thams cad kyi re ba thams cad khongs su skong ba'i las
mdzad pa/ thugs rje che ba/ rnam bar snang mdzadachen kho/ rtog pa/ khams gsumamanyam pa nyid la zhugs te/ sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs
![]thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i rgyal po/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi gnas/ 'dod pa'i khams thams cad na nor bu rin po che zer na bos rab tu smras pa dang/ ba dan kha dog
0 sna tshogs dril bu brgyus pa rlung gis bskyod ba dang/ me tog gi 'breng ba dang/ dra ma dang/ rgyan 'phrang dang/ chun 'chang dang/ zla ba lta bu s mdzes par byas pa/
de bzhin du thams cad bzhugs pa shes pa bstod pa na/ byang chub sems dpa'akhye ba phrag brgyad dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa la/ 'di ltaste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang/ nam mkha'i snying po dang/ rdo rje'i khu tshur dang/ 'jam dpal dang/ sems bskyed ma thag tu chos
kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang/ nam mkha' mdzod dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud kyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa dang/ de dag la sogs pa byang chub
sems dpa' bya ba phrag brgyad dang thabs cig ste/ yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyidi rnam
par dag pa'i sgo zhes bya ba// [“]thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mAr dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs
pa/ yongs su dag pa// yongs su byang ba yang dag par ston te/ 'di ltar rab tu dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ bya chub sems dpa'i gnas so//
@#// 'dod chags kyi mda' rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// reg pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/
'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// sdug pa'i 'ching ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// thams cad la
dbang phyug dang dbang po rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// lcab rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub//
sams dpa'i gnas so// dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de// 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// srid pa rnag par dag pa'i gnas de na/ 'di
ltaste byang chub sems pa'i gnas so// snyoms pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// rgyan rnam par dag pa'i gnas
de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// yid tshim par byed pa rnam par dag pa'iganas de na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub soms dpa'i gnas so//
snang ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas doni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ lus bde ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems
dngaba'i gnas so// gzugs rnam par dag pa'i gnas de na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// sgra rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste//
byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// dri rnam par dag ba'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// ro rnam par dag ba'i gnas den/ 'di lta ste/
byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// de'i phyir zhen/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par dag pa ste/ chosathams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong ba nyid bas/
shesarab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag ba'o/ 'gan rdo rje su la la thams cad kyi ngo bo nyidi rnam par dag pa'i sgo bsgrub pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di lan cig thos
na'ang de byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du/ sgrib pa thams cad dang/ chod pa dang/ nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang/ chos kyi sgrib pa dang/ las kyi sgrib pa chen po bsags
kyang sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa ngan song du nams kyang skye bar mi 'gyur/ sdig pa'ang byas ma thag tu sdug bsngal med par byang bar 'gyurar// su zhiga'adzin pa dang//
nyin re zhing klog pa dang/ kha ton byed pa dang/ tshul bzhin yid la byed pa de/ tshe 'dinyid la chos thams cad kyi mnyam nyid rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin thob bas/ chos thams
cad la dbang bar 'gyur ro// chos thams cad la dga' ba dang/ mgu ba dang/ mchog tu dga' ba myong bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sel
dba' chen po'i tsho bcu drug gis de bzhin gshegs pa ma/ rdo rje 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje do bzhin gshegs pa thams cad pa//
theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa/ dkyil 'khor thams cad pa do rje 'dzin mtha' dag gisaMms can gyi mchog/ khams gsum na lus pa mtha' dgan/
'jig rten gsum po thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba/ sems can gyi khams lus pa med pa 'dul ba/ don thams cad grub pa/ dam tshig chen po pa/ rdo rje gsang
ba'i soms can dums g.yog byas pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi don 'di ston te/ bzhin rab tu 'dzum zhing lag kha g.yas pa rdo rje'agyings te/ thog ma'i rdo rje chen po
gsor nas/ rang gi snying khar bstod pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin cing/ bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba rang gi de kho na nyid kyi snying po 'di smras so// hU~M/ de
nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhi ba'i chos nyidamangon par rdzogs par byang chub par sgrub pa zhes bya ba/
[s]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do// rdo rje sa banyid kyi phyir/ rdo rjemanyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub ba na byang chub chen po'o// don gcig pa'i phyir/
don gyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa na byang chub chen po'o// ngo bo nyid rnam bar dag pa'i phyir/ chos kyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i byang chub
chen po'o thams cad la rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir/ thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyidamangon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i byang chub chen po'o/ lagan rdo rje su la la chos mngonapa/
sgrub pa bzhi bo 'di dag nyan pa dang/ 'dzan pa dang/ klog pa dang/ sgom pa de sdig pa thams cad spyod kyang/ byang chub kyi snying pos 'dug gi bar du/ ngan song thams
tsa las yang dag par 'das par 'gyur ro/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das
ye shes kyi khu tshur yongs su 'a dzin pa don gnas 'di nyid rgya cher ston nying/ bzhin rab tu 'dzum dmul te/ chos thams cad kyi mnyam bzhad kyi snying po 'di lcas so// ma de
nas ma rungs pa thams cad 'dul ba/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas kyang/ yang chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis rnam par rgyal ba bsdu ba zhes bya ba/
[po ]@#// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrub ba 'di bshad de/ 'dod chags kyi spros pa med pa nyid kyis/ zhe sdang gi spros pa med pa nyid do// zhe sdang gi spros
zapa med pa nyid kyis/ gti mug gi spros pa med pa nyid do// gti mug gi spros ba med pa nyid kyis/ chos thams cad kyi spros pa med pa nyid do// chos thams cad kyi spros pa
kyi med pa nyid kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spros pa med par rig par bya'o// lagan rdo rje su la lashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshula'anyen pa dang/ 'dzin pa dang/
klog pa dang/ sgom pa des 'phul ba'i dbang gis khams gsum du skyes pa'i sems can thams cad gsad kyang ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur te// myur du bla med pa la de dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// denas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje chos nyid 'di'i don rgya cher ston to// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal
ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas/ khro gnyer dang bcas shing smin ma btog ste 'bar bar lta la/ pad+ma'i gdong khro zhing dgod de mche ba gtsigs nas/ rkang pa g.yon/
pa rkyang ba'i tshul du gnas nas/ rdo rje hU~M zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so// hU~M ! de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ngo bo nyid dag pa'i chos nyid thob pas/ ya
chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi bshes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ 'dod chags thams cad rnam
bar dag pas/ 'jig rtenan zhe sdang thams cad rnam par dag bar 'gyur ro// drim thams cad rnam par dag pas/ 'jig rten na sdig pa 'ams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro//
chos thams cad rnam par dag pas/ 'jig rtenan sems can thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// shes pa thams cad rnam par dag pas/ 'jig rten na shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje su la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang/ 'dzin pa dang/ klog pa dang/ 'chang ba thams cad kyi
nang na 'dug kyang/ pad+ma lta bu r 'dod chags kyi nyes pa rnams dang/ dri ma rnams dang/ glo bur gyi nyon mongs pa rnams kyis gos par mi 'gyur te/ gyur du bla na med pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don gnas 'di nyidi rgya cher ston cing
bzhin rab tu 'dzum dmul te/ pad+ma'i 'dabam kha 'byed pas/ 'dod chags la sogs pa'i dri mas me gos pa lta zhing/ pad+ma gzugs sna tshogs shes bya ba'i snying po 'di
smras so// hI: ! de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa khams gsum thams cad kyi dbang pos/ yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
dbang sgyur ba las byung ba'i ye shes kyi snying po zhes bya ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ dbang bskur ba sbyin pa ni/khams gsum thams cad kyi rgyal srid thon par
'gyur ro/ nor sbyin pa na re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs bar 'gyur ro// chos sbyin pa ni chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyidi thob par 'gyur ro// zang zing sbyin pa ni lus dang/
kag dang/ sams kyi bde ba thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i sAng po bzhin rab tu 'dzum ste/ rang gi mgo/
la rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur ba'i 'phreng ba 'ching zhing don 'di nyidi rgya cher bstan te/ dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi dam tshig rin po che zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di skyas so// tra/
gnas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur 'dzin pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pas/
bo yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i gnas rdo rje zhes bya ba// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i
phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ni/ chos thams cad thob/
par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ni/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
jo lnga'i phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ni/ lus dang/ ngag dang/ soms thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur ro// su la la ngashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang/ 'dzin pa dang/ 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang/ lung 'bog pa dang/ sgom pa des dngos grub thams cad dang/ phun sum tshogs pa thams
cad dang/ shes pa thams cad dang/ dgos pa thams cad dang/ lus dang/ ngag dang/ sems thams cad ngo tsher rdo rje'i dngos grub dam pa thob nas/ myur du
bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khu tshur dam tshig chen
pa'i rdo rje phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pas/ don gnas pa 'di rgya cher bstan te/ bzhin rab tu 'dzum zhing/ rdo rje sra ba'i phyag rgya dngos grub thams cad kyi mchog ces bya ba'i snying po/
'dismras so// a ! de nas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas/ yang 'khor lo ltar yi gi skor ba zhes bya ba//
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ ngo bo nyid med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa'o// mtshan ma med pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa'o/
smon pa med pa'i tshul gyis/ chos thams cad smon pa med pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pas/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o/
de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa don 'di nyid rgya cher ston to// bzhin 'dzum bzhin du/ ral gri des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'debs shing/
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying pomchoga'adi smras so// a: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor la 'dus pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas/
'khor lo chen po la 'jug ba zhes bya ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bstan to// rdo rje mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo la
'jug par 'gyur ro// den gyimanyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor lo la 'jug par 'gyur ro// chos thamasacad kyi mnyam pa nyid la
'jug pa ni/ dam pa chos kyi 'khor lo la 'jug par 'gyur ro// thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni/ 'khor lo thams cad la 'jug par 'gyur po/
de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba/ chos nyid 'di'i don rgya cher ston cing/ bzhin 'dzumanas/ rdo rje'i 'khor lo bskor ba'i rdo
rje'i 'khor lo thams cud la'ajug pa zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so// hU~M ! de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i snod kyis/
mchod pa thams cad kyi mchog ces bya ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod
pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su skyob pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin
pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thamasaud la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ya gir 'dri ba dang/ yi ger 'brir 'jug pa dang/ 'dzin pa dang/
klog pa dang/ rjod pa dang/ ston pa dang/ nyan pa dang/ sems pa dang/ sgom pa dang/ mchod pa byed pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod
@#/ pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i mdzod don yod de nyid rgya cher ston te/ bzhin rab tu 'dzum zhing/
zolas thams cad don yod pa'i dam tshig tu bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so// o/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad 'jul nus pas/ yang ye shes
kyi khu tshur yongs su 'dzin pa/ sems can thams cad 'dul ba shes pa'i snying po zhes bya ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ sems can thams cad
mnyam pa nyidi pas/ khro ba mnyam pa nyid do// sems can thams cad 'dul ba nyid pas/ khro ba 'dul ba nyid do// sems can thams cad chos nyid pas/ khro ba chos
nyid do// sems can thams cad rdo rje nyid pas/ khrob rdo rje nyid do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad 'dul ba ni byang chub bo// de nas
byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa/ don de nyidargya cher ston te/ bzhin rab tu 'dzum zhing rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgya dang/ rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi/
gzugs kyis/ rdo rje khro bo'i gad mo zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so// ha/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la gnas pas/ yang
chos thams cad mchog ces bya ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de// thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do//
thams cad don nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don nyid do// thams cad chos nyid pas/ shes rang kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chos nyid do// thams cad las nyid pas/
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyid du rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'dus gna'o rje de bzhin gshes pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi don yod pa'i dam
tshig gis dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ don yod pa thams cad kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so/ hUM : de nas
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ yang sems can thams cad byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di
bshad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po thos cad kyi rang bzhin yin pas/ sems can thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po can// nyams
thad rdo rje'i snying pos dbang bskur ba nyid pas/ sems can thams cad ngo rdzi'i snying bo can no/ ga thams cad rab tu 'byung bas/ sems can thams cad chos kyi snying po
[z ]/ can no// sems can thams cad kyibya ba byed pa la sbyor bas/ sems can thams cad ni las kyi snying bo can no// de nas phyi rol gyi rje 'i
rigs rnams kyis ca co'i sgra phyung nas/ chos nyid kyi don rgya cher stonatsong snying po phul te/ de nas rdo rje dbang phyug chen pos rang gi de kho na'i snying po 'di phul lo// dri
de nas ma mo thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te// mgrin gcig tu thams cad dgug pa dang/ gzung ba dang/ gzhig pa dang/ bsgrub pa'i dam tsheg ces
bya ba rang gi de kho na'i snying po 'bul lo// ny+nyo ! de nas sbrang rtsi byed la sogs pa mang po gsum gyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te// mgrin gcig tu 'ong gi de kho na'i sIng
la po 'di smras so// sA/ de nas sring mo bzhis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ rang gi de kho na nyid kyi snying po 'di phul lo// hU~M: de nas bcom ldan
'das de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas mu med pa la mthar thug rung mu med pa'i chos dang ldan pas/ yang cho ga 'di mthar thug par byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i phyir/ chos thams
chacad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi mthar thug pas/ byin gyis brlab pa rdo rje zhes bya ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha'
yas pa nyid pas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mtha' yas pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid pas/ tshe rje thams cad mu med pa nyid de//
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dum nyid pas/ chos thams cad du ma nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthar thug pa med pas/ chos thams cad mthar thug pa med pa yin no//
su la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang/ 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang/ ston pa dang/ rjod pa dang/ sgom pa de sangs rgyas dang byang chub
sems dpa'i spyod yul thug pa med pa'i mthar phyin te/ sgrib pa thams cad zad nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ rdo rje 'dzin par myur du 'gyur ro// de/
nas de bzhin gshegs ba thams cad 'dus te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di don yod pa dang/ thogs pa mang par myur du grub par bya ba'i phyir/ lag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba
byin no// sems can chen po legs so legs// bde ba chen po legs so legs// theg pa chen po legs so legs// blo gros chen po legs so legs// cho ga 'di
legs par smras// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin kun gyis/ 'bras bu yod pa 'dul ba'i mchog/ rdo rjemado sde byin gyis brlabs// cho ga'i rgyal po bla na med// gang
dngos/
grub dam pa thams cad kyang// sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa bzhin// ring por mi thogs thob par 'gyur// de skad gsungs nas gsang 'grub phyir// rdo rje can gyis
ts+tsa bshad pa las// kun mchog sangs rgyas mkhas bcas pa// thams cad kyisanam ngon par bstod// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang
mdzad/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i chos nyid brnyes pa// chos thams cad spros pa med pas/ ya nga bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig ces bya gi
rdo rje don yod pa'i chos mnyam panyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgro mchog dang po/ thog ma dang/ bu ma dang/ dbus med pa'i dam pa 'di gsungs so// byang chub
sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'dod chags chen po dngos grub dam pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba chen po dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'
chen po rnams kyi bde ba chen po dngos grub dam pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
[t ]de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po dngos grub dam pa ni/ bdud chen po'i stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro// byang chub
sams dpa' chen po rnams kyi bdud chen po'i stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa dngos grub dam pa ni/ khams gsum pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug chen po dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro
byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi khams gsum thams cad kyi dbang phyug chen po'i dngos grub dam pa ni/ ma lus pa na sems can gyi khams lus pa med pa yongs su sbyang bar 'dod
pa'i rgyu'i phyir/ 'khor ba la'ang chags shing/ brtson 'grus che ba'i byang chub sems dpa'achen po rnams kyi ma lus pa na/ sems can gyi khams lus pa med pa yongs su
bskyab pa dang/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang/ bde ba'i mchog shin tu bde ba chen po dngos grub rnam par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ji srid 'khor ba'i

gos pas// de bzhin gnas pa'i nyes pa yis// 'gro phan rnams la mi gos so// 'dod chags chen po rnam par dag bde ba che zhing nor che la// khams gsum/
dbang phyug thob pas na// sems can don rnams brtan par byed// lag na rdo rje su la lanang par langasanas/ mchog dang bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos
kyi rnam grangs 'di nyin re zhing 'don pa dang/ nyan pa dang/ 'dzin pa dang/ klog pa dang/ sgom pa de yid bde ba dang/ bde ba thams cad thob par 'gyur ro//
bde ba chen po thob/ rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig dngos grub kyi mchog kyang tshe 'di la thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchog kyang grubaste/
rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyi chen po 'am/ de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gsang ba pa'i bdug gog na rdo rje la bka' stsal
tshe pa/ gsang ba'i bdag po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i sngags kyi tshig ni nyi shu rtsa lnga pa 'di rnams so// oM chos nyid byang chub kyi sems rdo rje/ o kun tu bzang
po spyod pa// o yid bzhin gyinor bu/ e 'gog pa med pa// o skye ba zlog pa// o rnam par shes ba thams cad/ o 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos nyid chen po/
o brtson 'grus kyi go cha/ o kun tu 'gro ba/ o rdo rje sra ba'i soms/ hUM o de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ o ngo bo nyidi rnam par dag pa/ o chos nyid
shes pa rnam par dag pa// o las rnam par sbyong ba/ hU~M o nges par gnod mdzes rdo rje can phaT/ o 'dod pa la 'dod chags/ oM song ba'i rdo rje can : oM hUM
thams cad 'dul ba/ o o a zhes bya ba'i sgo/ o shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ a paM hU~M oM a o de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog/ o de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung rnam par dag pa// o de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rdo/ oM a sdig pa bcings pa thams cad chomasaM shago nga na song gi rgyud
thams cad las thar par gyis shig/ oM dam tshig thams cad kyi rdo rje hUM traT/ sdig pa gzhom pa'i phyag rgya dang sngags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba dngos grub
dam pa/ rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po dang/ de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje 'di ni sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyod pa rnams kyi rna lam du thos par mi 'gyur ro//
[= ]'chang ba 'am/ bsgom pa 'am/ bsti stang du bya ba'am/ ri mor bya ba 'am/ mchod par mi nus so// gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi
chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las than yi ge 'bru gcig tsam thos na'ang/ sems can de dag na gzhan na sangs rgyas mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyod pa yin no// mtha' dag rdzogs pa lta
ci smos/ lagan rdo rje gang la la dag sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig gapa'i klung brgyud cu'i bye ma snyed la bkur sti ma byas pa dang/ bla mar ma byas pa dang/ bsti stang dug byas pa dang/
mchod par ma byas pa de dag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos par mi nus so// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang na spyod pa'i sa phyogs de
mchod rten du 'gyur ro// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang gi lus la thogs sam/ glegs bam la bris te spyod pa'i gang zag de phyag bya ba'i gnas su 'gyur ro// de bskal pa bye
ba mang por skye ba dran bar 'gyur ro// de la bdud sdig can bar chad byed par ma 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po bzhadang/ lha gzhan rnams kyang de la bsrung ba dang/ bskyab pa dang//
mdor na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du 'dod pa de dang der skye'o// de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di phan yon mang mod kyi ngas phyogs
tsam zhig brjod do// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang/ byang chub sems dpa'
de dag dang/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin dang/ dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis
gsus pa la mngon par bstod do/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshul brgya lnga bcu pa rdzogs so// ta@#// rgya gar skad du/
Ar+ya badzA pA ra mi tA nA ma arasha ta ka na/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'das dang ma byon da ltar gyi// rgyal ba gang lags de kun gyi// yum ni dge ma khyod lags te// khyod ni lha mo rgyal ba'i sras// rang
dbazhin med pa'i rang bzhin can// sangs rgyas yum gyur de yi mtshan// dge ba bdag gis brjod par bgyi// 'byor bar 'dod pas mnyan par
[/]gyis[}]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang/ lam gyi rnam pa mkhyen pa nyid dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang// yang
(ngag pa'i mtha' dang/ de bzhin nyid dang/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang/ gzhan ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang/ bden pa dang/ khon dang/ yang dag pa dang/
phyi ma log pa nyid dang/ stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon bzhed pa dang/ dngos po med pa nyid dang/ dngos po mad pa'i ngo bo nyid dang/ chos
nyid dang/ chos kyi dbyings dang/ chos gnas pa nyid dang/ chos mi 'gyur ba nyid dang/ chos skyon med panyid dang/ chos kyi mtshan nyid dang/ chos bdag med
banyid dang/ ngo bo nyid med banyid dang/ sems can med banyid dang/ srog med pa nyid dang/ gso ba med pa nyid dang/ skyes bu med pa nyid dang/ gang zag med
banyid dang/ brjod par bya ba dang/ brjod par bya ba ma yin pa dang/ soms dang/ yid dang/ rnam pa shes pa dang bral ba dad/ mnyam pa med pa dang/
[4]]mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang/ bdag gi ba med pa dang/ rgyags ba med pa dang/ spros ba med pa dang/ spros ba dang bral ba dang/ spros pa thams cad dang bral ba ga
dang spros pa thams cad las shin tu 'das pa dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yum dang/ byang chub sems dba' thoms cad skyed pa dang/ nyan thos thams cad 'dzin
ba dang/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad bskrun ba dang/ 'jig rten thams cad 'dzin pa dang/ bsod nams kyi tshogs zad mishes pa bsags pa dang/ ye shes 'bab pa
dpa rdzu 'phrul mdzad pa dang/ lha'i mig rnam par sbyong bar mdzad pa dang/ lha'i rna ba rab tu dang bar mdzad pa dang/ pha rol gyi sems shes par mdzad pa dang/ sngon gyi
gnas rjes su dran par mdzad pa dang/ 'chi 'pho ba dang skyo ba shes par mdzad pa dang/ nyon mongs pa thams cad zad par mdzad pa dang/ 'phags pa dang/ gtsang ba dang/
bsangs pa dang/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la gnas ba dang/ yang dag pa'i spong ba'i shugs dang ldan pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs dang ldan pa dang/ dbang po
sbyong bar mdzad pa dang/ stobs mdzad pa dang/ kha na ma tho ba med ba dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi rin go ches mdzes par byas pa dang/ nor bdun sbyin par mdzad
pa dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ston pa dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ston bar mdzad pa dad dbang cu
thabasgrub pa dang/ sa bcu la gnas par mdzad pa dang/ stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa dang/ bod bar gyi skye mched gnyis mdzes par byas pa dang/ shes
blob bcu sgrub pa dang/ bag la nyal bcu'i dgra 'jig pa'i mdzad pa dang/ bsam gtan rnams bsgrub par mdzad pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da'
bar mdzad pa dang/ yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod pa dang/ shes pa thams cad mdzad pa dang/ nang stong pa nyid dang/ phyi stong pa nyid dpa/
phyi nang stong pa nyid dad/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang/ chen po stong pa nyid dang/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dang/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang/ 'dus ma byas stong pa
dang mtha' las 'dus pa stong ba nyid dang/ thog ma dang tha ma med ba stong pa nyid dang/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dad rang bzhin stong ba nyid dang/ chos thams cad
stong pa nyid dang/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang/ mi dmigs pa stong ba nyid dang/ dngos po med pa stong ba nyid dang/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyidi dang/ dngos po med
ba'i ngo nyid stong pa nyid dang/ ma byung ba dang/ ma skyes pa dang/ ma 'gags ba dang/ chad pa med ba dang/ rtag ba med pa dang/ don gcig pa ma yi/
ba dang/ don tha dad pa ma yin pa dang/ 'ong ba med pa dang/ 'gro ba med pa dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnam par sdom pa dang/ rtag tu brtag par bya ba ma yin
pa dang/ rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin pa dang/ gzhi med pa dang/ mtshan nyid med pa dang/ brtag por bya ba ma yin pa dang/ rig par bya ba ma yin pa dang/
thog ma dang tha ma 'jig pa med par mdzad pa dang/ kho pa med par mdzad pa dang/ gnyis med pa dang/ gnyis med pa ma yin pa dang/ zhi ba dang/ blo 'jug
pa rnam par sbas pa dang/ gnyan po mad pa dang/ ma gos pa dang/ nam mkha'i lam dang 'dra ba dang/ yod pa dang/ med par brjod pa ma yin pa dang
brjod pa ma yin pa dang/ rmi lam gyi ngo bo dang/ sgyu ma'i chos nyid dang/ mag la me bskor ba dang 'dra ba dang/ chos thams cad ro gcig pa nyid do// su

dgag yin pa de dag thams cad// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du chud cing/ 'dus te 'bu la yang dag par gzhol ba yin no/ rab 'byor gyis gsol ba//

bcang bar bya/ bklag par bya/ kun nub bar bya'o// dge ba'i chos byang chub kyi phyogs kyi tshos rnams dang/ nyan thos kyi chos rnams dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
