za nang du chud cing/ 'dus te 'ub la lang dag par gzhol ba yin no/ zhes bgyi ba de dag gang lags/ bcomaldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di
lta ste spyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi kha la tu phyin pa dang/ brjod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam
gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ nang stong pa nyidi dang/ phyi stong ba nyid dang/ phyi nang stong ba nyid dang/ stong ba nyid stong ba nyid dang/
chen bo stong ba nyid dang/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dang/ 'dus byas stong ba nyid dang// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang/ ma' las 'das ba stong pa nyid dang/ thog ma/
dang thum med ba stong banyid dang/ dor ba med ba stong ba nyid dang/ rang bzhin stong banyidi dang/ chos thams cad stong ba nyid dang/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong ba nyid dang rlu
mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyidi stong pa nyid dang/ dran pa nye bar gzhag ba bzhi dang
[p]ni/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang/ dbang po lta dang/ stobs lnga dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang ! 'phags pa'i las yan
lag brgyud pa dang/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang/ bsam gtan bzhi dang/ tshad med pa bzhi dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang/ rnam
bar thar pa brgyad dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/
mngon par shes pa rnams dang/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang da
so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ byams pa chen po dang/ snying rje chen po dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang/
lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ dgra bcom pa nyid dang/ rang byang chub nyid dang/ thams cad shes pa nyid dang/ lam gyi rnam ba
shes ba nyid dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ngo// rab 'byor dge ba'i chos byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dad/ nyan thos kyi chos rnams dang/ rang sangs
ga @#/ rgyas kyi chos rnams dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams gang dag lags pa de dag/ shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa'i nang du'ang chud cing/ 'dus te 'ub la yang dag par gzhol ba rnams yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar dge ba'i chos byang
chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang/ nyan thos kyi chos rnams dad/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang/ sangs rgyas
kyi chos rnams gang dag lags pa de dag she sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang duchudang/ 'dus te 'ubal yang dag par gzhol ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ma a la
lashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa na brab lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa'i phyir ro// rab
'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis a la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gting dpag dka' ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba//
rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin kha shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis a la la a la la shes rab kyi pha rol
[s/]tu phyin pa 'di ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i nga/
rab 'byor de bsan shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa na nam mkha' lta bu yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das kye ma a la la a la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa 'din mi ba rtson pas rtogs par dka' ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no// ji skad smras
pa de bzhin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mngon par mi brtson pa dang/ dge ba'i rtsa brlung ba dang/ yid mi gzhungs pa dang/ don du mi gnyer ba dang/
thos pa dang mi ldan pa dang/ shes rab chung ba dang/ sdig pa'i grogs pos zin pa dang/ sdig pa'i grogs po dang 'dra ba mang bo dang/ sdig pa'i grogs pos 'dzin du
bcug pa dang/ dad pa tsam dang ldan pa dang/ las dang po pa dang/ skal ba med pa'i tshul can dang/ yongs su mi 'dri pa'i tshul dad/ shes rab 'chal par
gyur pa byas pa dang/ le lacan dang/ brtson 'grus chung go dang/ snying stobs chung ba dang/ mos pa chung ba dang/ dge ba'i chos de dag la mngon par mi brtson pas
@#/ mos par dka' ba ste/ rab 'byor de lta bas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu na pas mos par dka' ba zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang rigs kyi bu
lam rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dinyan tam/ 'dzin ta/ 'chang ngan/ klog gam kun chub par byed dam/
bzlogazhan dag la 'ong rgya cher yang dag par rab tu sto nAn/ des 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ da ltar byung pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub bzung
ba yin no// rab 'byor de lta bas na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sumatshogs pa myur du blanamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
bar rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ rgyun mi 'chad khar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ bklag par bya//
kun chub par bya ste/ des na myur du bla na med du yong dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
bka' stsalanas/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'ang dang/ dge slong de dag dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang/ lha dang ) mi dang/ lha ma yin dang/ [M]
dri thar pa cas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga bcu pa rdzogs so//
@#// rgya gar skad du/ b+ha ga wa ti pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA sarba tathA ga ta mA te e ka akA ra nA ma// bod skad du/ bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol/
tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum yi ge gcig ma zhes bya ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma la phyagasatshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/
bcom ldan 'das rgyal bo'i khab bya rgod phung po'i 'o la/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum dad/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang
po dag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha
la tu phyin pa yi ge gcig ma zhes bya ba 'di/ sems can rnams la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zung zhig/ 'di lta ste/ a bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad
ces bko' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag dang/ lha dang/ mi dang//
lha ma yin dang/ dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// shes rab kyi pha rol
zatu phyin pa yi ge gcig ma rdzogs so//// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ko'u shi ka pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA/ bod skad du//
rgyu 'bags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ko'u shi ka zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus
gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ri la/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag du ma thams cad kyang gzhon
[%]nur gyur pa sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa// ko'u shi ka de gtsashes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa'i don ni 'di yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ gnyis su blta bar mi bu/ gnyis ma yin par yang ma yin mtshamaram na
mtshan mar ga yin par yang ma yin/ blang bar yang ma yin/ der bar ma yin/ bats+tshan par ma yin/ bsnon pa med par ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs par
ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin par yang ma yin/ rnam bar byung ba ma yin/ rnam par byang ba'ang ma yin par yang ma yin/ spang bar ma yin/ spang
ba ma yin par yang ma yin/ gnas su ma yin/ gnas ma yin par yang ma yin/ sbyong bar ma yin/ sbyong ba ma yin par yang su yin/ 'brel bar gu yin/
'grel ba ma yin par yang ma yin/ rkyen dum yin/ rkyen ma yin par yang ma yin/ chos su ma yin/ chos ma yin par yang ma yin/ de bzhin nyid ma yin/
de bzhin nyi ma yin par yang ma yin// yang dag pat+tin tha' ma yin/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ma yin par yang ma yin no/ ko'u shi ka de bzhin du/ shes rab kyi pha rol
du phyin pa'i don ni/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir/ shes rab kyi pa rol tu phyin pa nyid mas mo/ chos thams cad zab pa'i phyi'i/ shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// chos thams cad dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dban no// chos thams cud g.yo ba med pa 'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin la g.yo ba med do// chos thams cad rlom sems med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rlom sems med do// chos thams cad 'jigs pa med pa/ de
phyir ! shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jigs pa med do// chos thams cad bag tsha ba med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bag tsha ba med do//
zachos thams cad ro gcig pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ro gcig go/ chos thams cad skye ba med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba med do//
zlo chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'gag pa med do// chos thams cad nam mkha' lta bu'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa namamakha'
lta bu 'o// gzugs mu med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yumed do// de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par
shes pa mu med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba mu med do// sa'i khams mu med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mumed do/ de bzhin du chu'i khams
dwang mi'i khams dang/ rlung gi khams dwang/ nam mkha'i khams dang/ rnam par shes pa'i khams mu med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med do//
ri rab mu med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med do// rgya mtsho mu med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med do// rdo rje mnyam ba'i phyir/
yi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba mnyam mo// chos thams cad dbyer med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa dbyer med do// chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyidi dmigs
su med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med do// chos thams cadu gsal ba med par mnyam pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gtsang ba
med par mnyam mo// chos thams cad byed pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byed pa med do// chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir/ shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo// de bzhin du spyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/
brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ smon lam
gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'khor gsum yongs su dag pas mu med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa mu med do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'di ltar stong pa nyid bco brgyad de/ 'di lta ste/ nang stong pa nyidi dang/ phyi stong pa nyidi dang/
phyi nang stong pa nyid dang/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang/ chen po stong pa nyid dang/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dang/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang/
za'adus ma byas stong pa nyid dang/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang/ rang bzhin stong pa/
nyid dang/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong panyid dang/ mi dmigs pa stong ba nyid dang/ dngos po med pa stong ba nyid dang/ ngo bo
nyid stong pa nyid dang/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyide stong ba nyid de/ mdor na stong pa nyid 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rtsol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// skar ma rab rib mar me dang/
sgyu ma zil ba chu bur dang// rmi lam glog dang sprin lta bu // 'dus byas de ltar blta bar bya// na mo b+ha ga ba skye/ Ar+ya pradz+nyA pA ra ga ta yaM/ o de hi/ g+hin+d+ri
t+tI smi ti ga tig ti ba dza ye swA hA/ 'gag pa med cing skye med la// chad ba med cing rtag pa med// tha dad don min don gcig min/ 'ong med med cing 'gro mod
la spros bzhi bas zhi ba yi// rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ston pa// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang yin pa// smra mchog de la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan bshAr dwa ti'i bu dang/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang/ dge slong de dag dang/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang/ lha dang
mi dang/ lha ma yin dang/ dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa ko'u shi ka zhes bya ba rdzogs so// @#// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sA wA/ a kA pradz+nyA pA ra mi tAn ma ma hA yA na sU tra/
bod skad du/ 'phags ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge nyung ngu zhes bya ba thog ba chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal la
skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gnugan/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal bo'i khab na bya rgod phung bo'i ri la/ dge slong khri nyis stong lnga brgya'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang/ byang chub
sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa// lha bye ba phrag khrag khrig
'bum gyis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te/ dbal gyi snying po'i sang ge'i khri la shugs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa
sbyan ras gabrigs dbang phyug stan las langs te// bla gos phrag ba gcig la gzar nas/ bus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan
za 'das ga la ba de legs su thal mo sbyar ba btudunasaM 'dzum dmul te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge nyud
ngu la bsod nams che ba gang thos pa tsam gyis sems can thams cad kyi las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ba dang/ byang chub tu nges par gzhol bar 'gyur ba dang//
gang dag sngags bsgrub par brtson pa de dag bgegs ma mchis par gsang sngags 'grub par 'gyur pa bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu khyod yun ring por sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir
brtson pa legs so legs so// de'i phyir rigs kyi bu legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge nyung du labasod nams che ba gang thos
ba tsam gyis sems can thams cad kyi las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ba dang/ byang chub la nges par gzhol bar 'gyur ba dang/ gang dag gsang sngags bsgrub par brtson pa
cade dag bgegs med par sngags 'grub par 'gyur ba ngas khyod la bshad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// sems can thams cad la sman pa'i slad du bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe sems
can thams cad dgrol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// mnyam par gzhag pa des smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu'i phrag nas 'od zer 'bum phrag du ma byung ste/
'od zer de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad khyab par gyur to// sems can gang dag 'od zer des sems can dmyal ba pa yan chad/ sems can de dag thams cad blon
med pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyang rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung du lha'i tsan
ngan gyi byama'i char yang phab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'iri shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gsungs pa 'dilta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' mnyam pa'i sems
dang/ byams ba'i sems dang/ byas pa gzo ba dang/ sdig pa thams cad dang bral ba'i soms su bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po 'di'i gdon par
[n= ]@#// bya'o/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ oM mu ne mun//
zam hA mu na ye swA hA/ ngasashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rnyed pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo// sangs rgyas thams cad kyang 'di las
byung ngo// de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa chen po las khyod kyis 'di thob pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mchog tu gyur to// khyod de
bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer kun nas 'phags pa gshegs pa'i dpal brtsegs pa rgyal bo zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ zhes sangs rgyas nyid
du lung yang bstan to// gang dag khyod kyi ming nyan pa dang/ 'dzin pa dang/ klog pa gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher bstan pa dang/ glegs bam du bris nas mchod pa byed pa/
de dag thams cad ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro// tad+ya thU dza ya dza ya/ bdamA b+he/ a ba me/ sa ra sa ra Ni/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hi
rAd+hi'i/ de ba tA/ a nu pA la ne/ bud d+hod ta ri NaM/ pU ra ya b+ha ga ba ti/ sarba A shAm/ sarbas tA nAny+tsa/ sarba karma/ A ra Na/ bishA/
d+ha ya ! bi sho d+ha ya/ bud+d+ha a d+him+mane na sAhA/ don dam ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad skyes pa// byang chub sems dpa'i
gum 'phral du sdig pa 'phrog pa// bya chub sbyin par byed pa sta/ 'di lta ste/ bskal pa bye ba brgyar yang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis phan yon brjod par mi nus so//
'di bklags pas dkyil 'khor thams cad du dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro// gsang sngags thams cad kyang mngon du'agyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
dab ra chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'dus ci'i slad du/ 'di shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// thabs sla ba'i phyir te/ sems can gang dag spro ba chung ba de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang/
klog pa dang/ yi ger 'dri ba dang/ yi ger 'dir 'jug pa de dag thams cad thabs sla bas byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur te/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o//
bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du sems can thams cad la sman ba dang/ sems can bsod nams chung ngu rnams kyi don dang/ sman pa dang/ bde
zaba'i slad du/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal ba/ bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to// bde bar gshegs pa ngomatshar to// bcom ldan 'das
kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang/ dge slong de dag dang/ byang chub
soms dpa' de dag dang/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin dang/ dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la
mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge nyung ngu zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//
gar skad du/ ArU pany+tsa bing sha ti ba/ pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA gu kha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgonyi shu rtsa lnga pa
zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das
ri rab kyi zom la/ lha thams cad kyi mtshan mo'i gnas na/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bshes ldan 'das
lha dang/ ma dang/ lha ma yin dang/ rlung lha dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ ma 'am ci dang/ srin po dang/
rig sngags 'chang ba thams cad dang/ 'byung po dang/ log 'dren dang/ sha za dang/ snang ba dang/ mi snang ba'i ma mo'i tshogs shin tu mang zhing rgya che ba
dpag tshad lnga brgya'i dkyil 'khor du 'dus pa sha stag dang/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcus bskor cing mdun du bdar nas chos ston to// de nas byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje/ rdo rje rigs thams cad kyis yongs su bskor/ rig pa'i tshogs dang/ phyag rgya'i tshogs thams cad kyis rig sngags
'chang bye ba phrag du mas yongs su bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ bar snang las babs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal
te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gsang ba'i bdag po
chen bo lag na rdo rjer bka' stsal pa// gsang ba'i bdag po sgo nyishu rtsa lnga bo 'di dag ni/ pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo yin no/
zasangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal// o byang chub kyi sems rdo rje/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// o kun tu bzang po spyod pa/
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// o yid bzhin gyi nor bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// o 'gog pa med pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
sko'o o skye bar 'gyur ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// o rnam par shes pa thams cad/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// u0f00 'bar ba
chen po'i chos nyid/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// o brtson 'grus/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// o thams cad du 'gro ba/ shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// o rdo rje thams cad bstan pa'i sems/ shos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// o de bzhin gshegs pa thams cadu/ shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// o rang bzhin rnam par dag ba'i chos nyid lo shes rnam par dag pa// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// o las rnam par
sbyong ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// oM nges par gnod mdzes rdo rje can phaT/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// o 'dod pa la 'dod chags
rnam par dag pa// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// o mgyogs pa'i rdo rje can/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// oM hUM thams cad la 'gro ba//
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'i sgo'o// o hri:/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// a azhes bya ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// o
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// o am ba hU~M/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// o o/ shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// o de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mAg/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// o de bzhin gshegs pa thums cad kyi
gsung rnam par dag pa// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// o de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/
bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor do dang/
lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin dang/ dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod
do/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgo nying+ge'u rtsa lnga pa zhes bya ba theg ba chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// @#// rgya gar skad du/
Ar+ya b+ha ga ba ti/ pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA hri da yA bod skad du/ 'bogs pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying bo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag
'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i rol/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i
dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das zab mo'i chos kyi rnam grangs snang bzhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// yang

de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo spyod par rnam par blta ste/ phung po lnga po dag la de dag ngo bo nyid kyis stong
bar rnam par blta'o// de nas sangs rgyas kyis mthus tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen bo 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras
bcas/ so rigs kyi bu gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo la spyad pa spyod par 'dod pa des ji ltar bslab par bya ! do skad ces smras pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po'aphagasab sbyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis tshe dang ldan pa shA 'i bu la 'di skud ces smras so// shApa'i bu rigs kyi bu ge/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

bab mo rgyus sbyod par 'dod pa des/ phung golnga bo de dag ngo bo de kyis stong par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba de ltar blta bar bya ste/ gzugs stong pa'o// stong pa nyid gzugs so// gzugs las stong pa
gzhan ma yin no// stong pa nyid las gzugs gzhanAm yin te/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'dubyed rnams drang/ rnam par shes ba rnams stong pa'o// shA ri'i bu de ltar chos
thams cad stong pa nyid dang/ mchod med banyid dang/ markyes ba dang/ ma'agags pa dang/ drimamed pa dang/ dri ma dang bral ba dang/ bri ba med pa dang/ gang bamed pa'o// shA/
'i bu de lta bas na stong pa nyid gzugs med do// tshor ba med do// 'du shes med do// 'du byed rnams med do// rnam par shes pa med do// mig med do// rna ba med do// sna med do/
lce med do// lus med do// yid med do// gzugs med do// sgra med do// drimad do// remed do// reg bya med do// chos rnams med do// mig gi khams med cing/ mig gi
tsam// rnam par shes gi khams med panas/ yid kyi khams med cing/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du med do// ma rig pamedi/ gcig pa zad bamed pa nas/
na shi mad cing/ rgashi zad pa'i bar du med do// sdug bsngal ba dang/ kun 'byung ba dang/ 'gog pa dang/ lama rnams med do// shes pa med do// thob pa med do/ ma thob pa'ang med do//
shA li'i bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa'a rnams thob pa med pa'i phyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten nas te/ sams kyi sgrib pa med pas 'gas pamed cing/ phyin ci log la 'dus te/

mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar phyin to// dus gsum du rnam par zhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten te/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par

( rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// shA'i bu de ltabs na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngags te/gi pa chen po'i sngags dang/ bla na med pa'i sngags dang/ miganya'ong dang mnyam pa'i sngags/ sdug bsngal thams cad rab
tu zhi bar byed pa'i gsang sngags te/ maleg pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni// gsang sngags bden zhing/ rig pa yin par shes par bya'o// taduts+tshA/ ga te ga te/ ba ra ga te pA ra
sangag te/ bod+hi swAhA/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo la de ltar bslab par bya'o/// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ting nge
tsam 'dzin de las bzhengs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/
khyod kyis ji skad bstan pa bzhir/ shesarab kyi b.rol tu phyin pa'abamo la spyad bar bya sta/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang rjes su yi rang zhes legs so bya ba byin no// bcom ldan
'das kyis de skadaces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug dang/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang/
lha dang/ mi dang/ lhag yin dang/ dri bar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi
bcol tu phyin pa'i snying po rdzogs so//(@#// rgya gar skad du/ A pradzAbAranItA sUr+ya gzhomahAyAn sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags bshes
rab kyi thapo'o tu phyin pa nyi ma'i snying po thog ba chen po'i do/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das
lul ma ga d+han chos kyi dgon pa na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun rab tumang ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyasakyi zhing mtha' yas pa nas 'dus pa chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/
tshe 'khor ster byang chub sems dpa'anyis rab tu snang ba zhes bya 'dug pa de stan las langs te/ com ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das bdag de bzhin gshegs pa 'a zhu ba mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das gnang ba'i skabs dbye ba gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka stsal ba/ ci dang 'dod pa dris shig da
bshad par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dang nyig rab tu snang bas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das thabs mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpas ji ltar shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka'astsal to// rigs kyi bu thabs mkhas pa'iting ba ni nyi ma zhes bya ba yod pas/ de la bya chub sems dpa' rnams kyis
swA de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba/ jiltar bslab par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba// rigs kyi bu 'di ltathabs mkhas ba'i nyi ma'i ting nge 'dzin rnam pa
bdun yod de/ gang zhen/ dang bo ni 'di ltag gas myu gu smin par byed bltar/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting pa'adzin nyag gus sems can rnamasalabyang chub kyi lu gu smin par mdzad do/ gnyis pa/
la 'bri dgrol med pa ltar/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi thugs rjen sems can thams cad la snyoms bar mdzad do// gsum pa nams nyal nyil srog bltar/ byang chub sems dpa'ilhag

ca mthong ngeshes rab kyis nyon mongs ba'i nyal nyilanams sreg par byed do/ khazhi bani mas 'khyags pa 'ju ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin gnyen po la shes dang ldan pas nyon mongs ba'akhyags pa/
'jub lta bu r byed do/[… ]lnga panyi mas kun bsol bltar/ byang chub sems dpa'i so sor kun tu rtog pa'i ye shesakyis gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i mun pa sel bar byed po/ drug bar nyi mas gling bzhi 'khor
bltar/ bya chub sems dpa' 'phrin las phun sum tshogs pas sdug bsngal gyi chu bo bzhi las thar pa'amadzad do/ bdun ba ni mas kun la snyoms pa ba bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod ba phun

sum tshogs pas sems can thams cad rab tu dga' bar mdzad ba'i thabasan dro ba'i las lta bu 'o/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'a rnams kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya ste/
des 'di ltar chos thams cad rang bzhin med pa dang/ mtshan med pa dang/ mtshan ma thams cad dang rag tuphrul ba dang/ dngos po med pa dang/ dngos bo thams cad dang bral ba dang/ gang zag pa med
ba dang/ gang zag ba thams cad dang bral ba dang/ ngo nyid kyis stong pa la bslab par bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos nyid dang/ chos kyi dbyings dang/ de bzhin nyid dang/ yang dag pa'i mtha' dang
mnolo pa de bzhin nyid dang/ gzhanam in ba de bzhi nyid dang/ bden pa dang/ de kho na'i don la byang chub sems dpas bslab par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang
chub sems dpa' nyim rab tu snang ba la 'di skad ces bka'astsal to// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dbas yang chos thams cad mangon par 'du bya ba med pa dang/ skye ba med pa
la bslab par bya'o// chosathams cad rang bzhin med bar rnam par dag pa la bslab bar bya'o// gzugs la sogs pa'i chos thams cad kyang rang bzhin gyis stong par shes par bya'o// ngobodi
kyis dben par shes par bya'o// rigs kyi bu gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdo 'dzin par byed na/ des las kyi sgrib pa byang bar 'gyur ro// do bsod nams kyi tshogs skye bar 'gyur
ro shes rab kyi tshogs tshad med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// dran pa dang ldan pa dang/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang ldan bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang
byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// mang thos dam pa'i chos la
brtson/ sems can kun la byams par ldan// brtson 'grus go cha phun sum tshogs// bdag dang gzhan gyi don la gos/ bsam gtan ting 'dzin sgom la brtson// budag dang
sems can 'du shes med// yang dag theg pa'i lam la zhugs// sngon gyi rgyal sras de ltar spyod/ mkhas pas ma nor de bzhin slob/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
bka' stsal pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' la rab tu snang ba dang/ lha dang mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//
phags pa shesarab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyi ma'i snying bo theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// @#// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tsan+d+ra gat+taM pAdzA pA ra mi tA sa
kA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags la zla ba'i snying bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag ts+tsha la//
'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod phung po'i ri del/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen bo tshad med grangs med pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'
rab tu mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ 'i tshe 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zla ba'i snying po 'dug pa stan las langs nas/ bcos ldan 'das la
'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dziltar bslab par bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'a dus
kyis bka' stsal ba/ zla ba'i snying bo chos thams cad dngos bo dang bral kha gang yin pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na zla ba'i dkyil 'aran rtog
[s ]pa med kyang gling bzhir 'khor bar byed nying kun pa rnams rab tu sel to// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
pa ni rtog pa med kyang phyin go bzhi rnams la thugs rjes 'khor zhing/ rang bzhin gyis nyon mongs pa rnams sel bar byed kyang mi rtog pa'i phyir ro/ klu ba'i snying pos gsol pa/ bcom//
ldan 'das byang chub sogs dba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la du gachis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ gas kyi bu byang chub sems dba'ishes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam bganyis/
zag ba dang bcas pa dang thug pa med bu'o// rigs kyi bu de la zag pa dang bcas ba'i shes rab rigs pas spyopa'i sa'i gnas skabs na gzung bar rtog pa dang 'dzin par rtog pa ste/ de spong bar/

byed na brag pa dang bcas pa'ishes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// rigs kyi bu de la ga pa med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa na mthong ba'i lam gyi rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes ste/ ye shes de
nirtog pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir na mi rtog pa'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa// pha rol dang tshu rol gyi mtha' gang 'ata'ang mi gnas pa'i phyir ro/
shes rab nagazugs nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du'ang bzhin med pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin med par shes par bya'o// gzugs la sogs pa'i chos rnams
[62 ]dus gsum du mi dmigs shing/ ma bcings ma grol bar shes par bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid bas/ shes rab kyi pha thol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do// chosathams
cad 'gag pa med bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'gag pa med pa nyid do// chos thams cad mtshan ma med pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma med ba'o// chos thams
cad skye ba med pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye bzhed bgo/ chos thams cad chad pa med bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pachad pa med pa'o// chos thams cad 'ong ba red pas/
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ong ba med pa'o/ chos thams cad 'gro ba med pa nyidi pas/ shes rab kyi pha pho'o tu phyin pa 'gro ba med ba de do// chos thams cad rtag pa med bas/ shes rab
kyi ba lo tu phyin ga rtag ba med pa nyid do// chos thams cad tha dad pa med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tha dad pa med pa nyid do// chos thams cad don gcig bshad pas//
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don gcig ba nyid do// chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i de kho nyid dus/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po med pa'i bo 'di/ mdongan thoms cad mtshanam dang/

rang bzhin dang/ ngo bo nyid las 'das pas de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de lta bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngags so// tadush+tsa/ o khri[] pradzI ma hA bradz+nyA tsaNapradz+nyA sarba sha
tsam@#// sakari sAhA/ chos rnams thams cad rgyu las byung// de nyid kun rdzob bden pa ste// rang bzhin med cing spros med bas// de nyid don dam spyod yul la//
bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i snying po dang/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang/ lha dang/ midad/ lha ma yin dang/
drir bcas pa'i 'jig rten yarengs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs la mngon par bstod do// 'thogs ga zla ba'i snying po shes rab kyi b.rol tu phyin pa theg bachen po'i mdo rdzogs so//
rgya gar dadu/ Ar+ya pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA sa man+ta b+ha dra ma hA yA na sUtra/ bod skad du/ 'bags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kun tu bzang bo theg pa chen po'i
blo sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+ha dgon par chos kyi snying bor bzhugs te/

phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med grangs med pa nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpar sangs rgyas kyi shing rdul phra mo dang mnyam pa dang thabs cig go thams cad kya kun tu bzang bo'i smon lam la
[”]mtha' brnyes pa spyod pa la gnas ba'o/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos chos thams cad rnam par mi rtog pa bstan pa zhes bya ba'i ting pa'azhi la snyoms par zhugs so// ti de
'dzin de'i mthus 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra mo dang mnyam pa thams cad du g.yos so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la phyag gis dbul reg
bar gyur to// de ltar reg pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang rab tu g.yos par gyur/ lha rnams kyisamathun par tshigs su bcad pas bstod pa// 'jig rten sgron ma lha mi'i dpe las 'das//
yon tan rgya mtsho lta bu r bA rol phyin// srid pa'i mtsho las 'gro ba khyod kyis sgrol// ded dpon khyod kyis rab tu bskyab par gsol/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos/
bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bslab par bya ba'i don shas ba 'dra ba dang/ shes rab yin pa la bslab par bya/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
kun tu bzang bo shes ba 'dra bani/ 'jig rten tshogs kyi ka ba rnams kyi shes rab gang yin ba'o// shes rab yin pa nas dang po yanachad kyi shes rab gang yin pa'o// bcom ldan
'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang/ lha dang mi'i bcas pa'i 'jigarten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa 'amangon par bstod do//
phags pa kun tu bzang bo theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya pradz+nyA pA ra mi tAbadzra pA Nis hA yAn sU tra/ bod skad du/
'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lag na rdo rje'i mdo thog pa chen khaM/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus la cig
na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe 'khor ded byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje 'dug pa stan las langs te/ bemaldan 'das 'di skad res gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems

ngangs shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar bslabapar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lagamarngo rjebyang chub sems dpas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/
chos thams rugs bamed bamed pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bslab par bya'o// gzhan yang gzugs la sogs ba'i chos thams cad rang bzhin mchis pa dang/ mtshanam ma mchis pa dang/ dngos po

dang bral ba dang mi dmigs pasan/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// nang stong pa nyidanas/ dngos bo med pa stong pa de kyi phyir/ nang shes rab kyapha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ lag na

rdorje shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul ste/ rig pa chen po'i sngags 'di'i tshig 'di dag go/ tad+ya thA/ oM mu ni mu ni ma hA mu na ye swAhA/ sushig/shes rab kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin par byed na/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos rnams gzung bar 'gyur ro// de skye ba dran bar 'gyur ro// mi khom pa thams cad spangs par 'gyur ro// bsod nams kyi 'bras butshang mang
tsa bar thob bar gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang dus rtag tu 'grogs bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi sems dang ldan par 'gyur ro/// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal/
pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdodza dang/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin dang/ drilar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs ngalamangon par bstodado// 'thags pa/
shes rab kyi pha rel tu phyin pa lag na rdo'imade thegapa chen bo rdzogs so// @#// rgya gar skadadu Ar+ya pradzAsAr mi tAbadzraka tu mahAyAn sA tra/ bod skad du//

'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyimado theg chen po// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcigan bcom ldan 'das
rgyal po'i khab na bzhugs te/ thams cad dpaldan pa'i 'khor dang thabs cig go/ de nas de'i tshe 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje rgyal mtshan 'dug pa de stan las 'bangs te/ bcom ldan 'das
la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos gang dang ldan n/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ bcom ldan 'as kyis bka' stsal// rdo rje rgyal mtshanachos rnam pa bzhi dang ldan n ste/

bzhi ba/gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad stong pad dusangon ba dang/ 'dus byas thams cad mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal bar shes pa dang/ spros pa thams cad dra la'itshos nyid du ldan pa dang/ gsar

[r]/ (partogami dmigs par bsgom pa'o// gzhan yang chos rnam pa bzhi dang ldan na shes rab skye ba'i rgyu ste/ bzhi gabagon 'di lta ste/ dang po gang zag chosasmakha'i mkhan po ston pa dang/ gnyis pa de'i dam pa'i chos nyan pad pa/

! gsum pa don la 'jug ci sems pa dang/ bzhipagazhan la tshul bzhin du ston pa'os pa ste/ 'dinishis bu skyo ba'i rgyu'o// rigs kyi bgazhanayo ru chugs gas dpa' rnams kyis 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad ng ngabazhin gyis

rnam par dag pas stong pa dang/ bdage dpa dang/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo ri dang/ mtshan med pa dang/ mkhas pa dang/ ma grol ba dang/ snang ba med pa dang/ mun pa mang pa'i rang bzhin du shes bar bya'o// de lta bas na byang chub

sems dpa' rnams kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang/ gnas pamed pa'itshul gyis shes rab kyi pha le'o tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
dngos po'i rigyo ni du bsgom// shes rab skye ba'i rgyu lamos// mtshan ma thams cad dang bral ba'i/ shes rab don la bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skadaces bkastsalanas/ bya ba
sems dpa' rdo rje rgyalamtshan la sogs pa lha dang/ mi dang/ lhag len dang/ dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsus pa la mngon par bstod do/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyimado rdzogs so//
